translation.en: Terrific!
-[alert buzzing] -[creaking]
translation.zh: ‎（最高安防 仅限授权员工入内）

translation.en: [man] Special delivery for Mr. Loon E. Tunes.
translation.zh: ‎给先生的特快专递 精神病先生？

translation.en: All right.
Catching some Z's, huh?
Did you go pee-pee while you sleepy, huh?
I heard you can't hold it in.
Hartman?
Hey, you quakin' in your boots?
You better be, 'cause I'm your new attendant.
translation.zh: ‎你最好害怕我 因为我是你的新护工

translation.en: The name's Hal L.
And you're in my world now.
Psycho on the loose!
♪ When my eyes beheld an eerie sight ♪ ♪ For my monster from his slab Began to rise ♪
translation.zh: ‎（塞勒姆 拥有女巫历史的城市）

translation.en: Good morning!
Halloween's upon us!
[woman on radio] Hello, my witches and warlocks. It's your ghoulish DJ Aurora.
translation.zh:
‎我的女巫和术士们 大家好
‎我是你们恐怖的主播欧若拉

translation.en: I hope you're ready for tomorrow night and all the spooky things that frighten.
translation.zh:
‎希望你们已经为明晚
‎各种恐怖诡异的东西做好了准备

translation.en: I know I am.
Hey, you missed. The yolk's on you.
Thanks for the free breakfast.
Rocky Balboa style.
I'm making the kids' costumes out of tinfoil
'cause I'm old-school, Teresa.
-Thanks! -[woman] Have fun!
Violet Valentine.
[woman] Have a happy Halloween tomorrow, Hubie.
translation.zh: ‎祝你明天万圣节快乐 修比

translation.en: You, too, Mrs. Banerjee. I hope you get more tricks than treats.
translation.zh:
‎你也是 班纳吉太太
‎希望你被捣蛋的次数比得到的糖多

translation.en: -[Banerjee chuckles] -Okay. Number 59. Looking for 59.
Yep!
Right here, Pubie.
Give me a half-pound of roast beef.
Mr. Landolfa…
[stammers] …Hubie. With an H.
Not anymore. [laughs]
[Hubie] Okay.
Mrs. Phillips, I'll be with you in a minute.
translation.zh: ‎菲利普斯太太 我马上给你服务

translation.en: Is that the first girl you ever talked to, Pubie?
translation.zh:
‎那是你说过话的
‎第一个女生吗 怂逼？

translation.en: Hey, no. I talk to my girlfriend all the time.
translation.zh: ‎喂 不是 我总和我女朋友说话

translation.en: -I've never seen you with a girlfriend. -She is a Canadian resident of Canada.
translation.zh:
‎-我从来没看见过你有女朋友
‎-她是居住在加拿大的加拿大人

translation.en: Uh, Canada Dry region.
Mr. O'Doyle.
Shouldn't you and your cohort be, uh, in school right now?
translation.zh:
‎你和你的小伙伴
‎现在不应该在学校吗？

translation.en: -It's Sunday, dumbass. -[Hubie mutters]
[Landolfa] Know what? I don't want the roast beef.
-Give me some of the lamb's head. -Lamb's head? We don't have lamb's head.
translation.zh:
‎-给我来点羊头吧
‎-羊头？我们不卖羊头啊

translation.en: -No? What's that right there? -Which one?
Got ya!
It's fun working with you, always.
translation.zh: ‎和你一起工作 一直都很有趣

translation.en: That is a good one.
Hey, you got Sergeant Downey.
Hey, Steve. It's Kenny Fonda with the Westford PD.
translation.zh:
‎史蒂夫 你好
‎我是韦斯特福德警局的坎尼·方达

translation.en: -How you doin' there, Kenny? -[Kenny] Good, buddy. Good.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么样 坎尼？
‎-很好 兄弟

translation.en: Hey, I just wanted to give you a heads-up.
translation.zh: ‎喂 我想打电话给你提个醒

translation.en: We had someone escape from the psych ward up here.
translation.zh: ‎我们这边精神病院有人逃走了

translation.en: A guy from your neck of the woods.
Richard Hartman.
Richie Hartman's been locked up since Carter was president.
translation.zh:
‎理查·哈特曼从卡特是总统的时候
‎就一直关着

translation.en: [Kenny] Yeah. Just thought you might wanna know
translation.zh: ‎好了 我觉得你应该知道一下

translation.en: in case he gets sentimental for his hometown.
translation.zh: ‎万一他想念家乡 回去了

translation.en: And didn't you testify against him, Steve?
translation.zh:
‎当时是不是你给他证明
‎有精神病的 史蒂夫？

translation.en: He doesn't strike me as a forgive-and-forget type.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉他不是那种
‎有过节能轻易原谅并忘掉的人

translation.en: Yeah, but you know what? I hope he comes looking for me.
translation.zh: ‎行 但你知道吗？我希望他来找我

translation.en: 'Cause he will be in a world of pain.
-Of pain-- -[loud slam]
-[Kenny] What the hell? -I gotta go, Kenny.
-Hubie, what do you want? -Hey, Officer Steve.
translation.zh:
‎-修比 你要干嘛？
‎-嗨 史蒂夫警官

translation.en: I saw Andy O'Doyle buying suspiciously massive amount of eggs and toilet paper.
translation.zh:
‎我看到安迪·欧道尔买了
‎惊人数量的鸡蛋和厕纸 非常可疑

translation.en: -Not a crime to buy eggs or toilet paper. -Oh, yeah. That goes without saying.
translation.zh: ‎买鸡蛋或者厕纸不是犯罪 ‎好吧 不言而喻

translation.en: But it doesn't take Sherlock Holmes to deduce malicious intent.
translation.zh:
‎但不言而喻不会影响
‎夏洛克·福尔摩斯去推论蓄意动机

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -Lambardi's Pizza's doin' a sale tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 行
‎-兰巴蒂披萨明天搞促销

translation.en: One slice, one soda, one dollar, if you wear a costume to the shop.
translation.zh:
‎只要穿着万圣节服装来店里
‎一块披萨、一瓶苏打水 一共一美元

translation.en: To me, that's a great deal, but it's also a riot waiting to happen.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得是很划算的
‎但也一定需要在人群嘈杂中等待

translation.en: Call the hotline.
I did call the hotline 100 times,
but I think you guys got a connection problem.
translation.zh: ‎但你们应该是线路连接出问题了

translation.en: -Salem PD. -Yes. Your officer, this is Hubie Dubo--
translation.zh:
‎-塞勒姆警局
‎-喂 警官 我是修比·杜布…

translation.en: -Hubie, get in here. -Okay.
-Bring it in here. Get in here. -What's up?
translation.zh:
‎-从这里进来 过里啊
‎-什么事？

translation.en: Now, it's Halloween. In Salem.
translation.zh: ‎万圣节到了 而且这里是塞勒姆

translation.en: And I got a lot of real issues on my plate.
-[Hubie] I know. -[tires screech]
[Andy] Look who's here.
-[boy 1] Hubie! -[boy 2] Hubie!
-Do we do-- -Get out of here!
Over and out-- [thuds]
-[boys clamoring] -[Andy] Guys, let's get him!
[boys shouting] Come on! Come on!
♪ Happy Halloween Happy Halloween… ♪
[boy 1] Eat some shit!
Snitch.
[Hubie] Why?
[boy 3] He flew like 25 feet!
Well, hello, there.
You need a hand?
Boy, that was quite a tumble you took there, fella.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 朋友 你刚才这一摔挺狠的

translation.en: Nope. That's--
Nothing broken, physically speaking.
Well, it's not right what those hooligans did.
translation.zh: ‎那些小流氓做的事情 很不对

translation.en: We gotta expect a scare here or there. Kids being kids.
translation.zh:
‎小打小闹都是正常的
‎孩子毕竟是孩子

translation.en: -Oh, say, that's some heck of a thermos. -[Hubie] Yeah, that's my baby.
translation.zh:
‎-你这个保温杯不错啊
‎-对 这是我的宝贝

translation.en: It's kind of like a Swiss Army thermos. I made it when I was in the Scouts.
translation.zh:
‎这个可以说是瑞士军刀保温杯了
‎我当童子军时做的

translation.en: Maybe you've had enough bike riding for one day.
-How about if I give you a lift home? -You're not gonna have to drive far.
translation.zh:
‎-不如我开车送你？
‎-你不用开太远

translation.en: 'Cause I live right over here.
Your kids must have helped you with all of this.
translation.zh: ‎肯定是你的孩子们帮你弄的吧

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I don't have any kids. As far as I know.
translation.zh: ‎我没有孩子 据我所知没有

translation.en: No, I definitely don't.
I do have a girlfriend. She lives up in Canada.
translation.zh: ‎但我有女朋友 她住在加拿大

translation.en: Northern section. Ontarionto.
translation.zh: ‎北方地区 安大略多伦多

translation.en: So, you probably couldn't find her up there.
-Ah. Look at those purple mums. -Mom planted those.
And you gotta love the old-school ghost you got working over there.
translation.zh:
‎你肯定喜欢你那边正在做的
‎老式传统的鬼

translation.en: [Hubie] Yep.
Scary ghost. Yes.
And looks like we're neighbors.
'Cause I just moved in right there this morning.
-[Hubie] You moved here? -I'm Walter Lambert.
translation.zh:
‎-你刚搬进来？
‎-我叫沃特·兰伯特

translation.en: Hubie Dubois. It's a pleasure, Hubie. I'll tell you what.
translation.zh:
‎-我叫修比·杜布瓦
‎-幸会 修比 我告诉你

translation.en: I'm gonna invite you and Mom over for dinner once I get my kitchen set up,
translation.zh:
‎等我把厨房收拾好
‎我要邀请你和妈妈过来吃晚餐

translation.en: 'cause I make the best chili east side of the Rockies.
translation.zh:
‎因为我做的甜椒炖肉
‎是落基山脉东边最棒的

translation.en: Ooh. My belly just said yes for the both of us.
translation.zh: ‎我的肚子刚刚替我们两个答应了

translation.en: And your butt just made some room.
translation.zh: ‎你的屁股刚刚腾出了一点空间

translation.en: They must've got loosened out of me with the landing.
translation.zh: ‎肯定是刚才落地的时候 放跑了气体

translation.en: -It's-- it's fine. It's natural. -It is.
translation.zh:
‎-没事的 这是自然现象
‎-对

translation.en: -Yeah. -Thanks.
Anyway, you take care, Hubie. All right?
translation.zh: ‎总之 你保重 你叫修比 对吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -And have a happy Halloween.
Oh, and Hubie.
If you ever hear some commotion
coming from my house, it's nothing to be concerned about.
translation.zh: ‎里传来骚乱的声音 没什么好担心的

translation.en: So, you don't need to come over and check on me or anything.
translation.zh: ‎你不用过来查看一切是否安好

translation.en: In fact, it's important that you don't.
translation.zh: ‎其实 你不要过来 这对我很重要

translation.en: Sure thing, Mr. Lambert.
Walter.
Hey, I'm home.
[woman] Did that darn skeleton frighten you again, Hubie?
translation.zh:
‎那个该死的骨架
‎又吓到你了吗 修比？

translation.en: No! I was just practicing yelling, Mom. Everything's good.
translation.zh:
‎没有！我只是在练习叫喊 妈妈
‎我一点事都没有

translation.en: Oh, dear boy. This town is making you so jittery.
translation.zh: ‎好 宝贝儿子 ‎这个城市让你有点心神不宁

translation.en: It just breaks my heart.
I'm fine. Is that a new shirt?
Mrs. Banerjee and I went to the thrift store today.
translation.zh: ‎班纳吉太太今天和我去了二手商店

translation.en: Guess how much? Fifty cents!
"Boner donor?" Now, what does that even mean?
Well, I think boner's another word for a mistake.
Like, I made a big boner in math class.
translation.zh: ‎比如 我今天在数学课堂上糗大了

translation.en: So, maybe boner donor means I donate mistakes.
translation.zh:
‎所以或许糗捐献者
‎意思是我捐献了错误

translation.en: That makes sense.
I met the fellow who moved into the Andersons' house next door.
translation.zh: ‎我见到了隔壁搬进安德森房子的人

translation.en: Walter Lambert. Seemed like good people.
translation.zh: ‎沃特·兰伯特 看样子是个好人

translation.en: -Oh, well, that's nice. -Yeah.
Some improvement over those Andersons.
The way they used to toss firecrackers at you.
Oh, no. That was the Epsteins.
translation.zh: ‎不是 那是爱普斯坦一家

translation.en: The Andersons used to throw garbage into my bedroom window.
translation.zh: ‎安德森一家以前往我的窗户里扔垃圾

translation.en: Well, who was it chased you around the yard with a tennis racket?
translation.zh: ‎拿着网球拍在院子里追你的人是谁？

translation.en: That was Dad.
God rest his soul.
-Oh, for sure. -[Mom] Cookies are done.
You wanna help me frost 'em?
-Can I lick the spoon, or… -[Mom] Deal!
translation.zh:
‎-我可以舔勺子吗 或者…
‎-成交！

translation.en: Okay.
[chuckles] Now, I know that Halloween is very special to you, sweet boy.
translation.zh:
‎我知道万圣节
‎对你来说很特别 乖儿子

translation.en: It's been your favorite holiday since you were knee-high.
translation.zh:
‎从你到我膝盖那么高的时候
‎万圣节就一直对你很特别

translation.en: Well, we're Jewish, so that eliminated Christmas and Easter and Ash Wednesday.
translation.zh:
‎我们是犹太人
‎所以就没有圣诞节、复活节和圣灰日

translation.en: And I am so proud at how hard you work
to make sure that Halloween is safe and fun for everyone in this town.
translation.zh:
‎保证万圣节对这个城市里的每一个人
‎都是安全有趣的

translation.en: I'm sensin' a big "but" coming.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉到你下一句话是“但是…”呢

translation.en: -But… -Okay.
…this town is as full of bullies now as it ever was in the 1600s.
translation.zh:
‎现在这座城市里面全是霸凌者
‎不像17世纪初那会儿了

translation.en: You have to learn to stand up for yourself.
I just get scared.
I know you do.
We all get scared.
But this year, you're gonna have to find that bravery that's deep within you.
translation.zh:
‎但是今年 你必须要找到
‎内心深处的那种勇敢

translation.en: It's time.
Ah, the good old days.
When the town toughs only used to throw crab apples.
translation.zh: ‎那时候城里的坏家伙只会扔酸苹果

translation.en: Ah, Officer Steve. You always had it going on.
translation.zh: ‎史蒂夫警官 你总是做什么都很顺利

translation.en: "Most likely to marry his pillow." Still don't get that one.
translation.zh:
‎“最可能跟他的枕头结婚
‎还是那么无厘头”

translation.en: "Most friendly."
"Most popular."
"Best looking."
The high school hat trick.
Could not have happened to a nicer woman.
translation.zh:
‎找不到一个更好的女人
‎去颁发三连冠了

translation.en: Maybe if I wasn't such a scaredy-cat like mom was sayin',
translation.zh: ‎或许如果我不是像妈妈说的那么怯懦

translation.en: I would have asked you out.
And the cutest couple would have been Violet and Hubie.
translation.zh: ‎最可爱情侣就会是维奥蕾特和修比了

translation.en: Monster! [screams]
[Mom] Hubie, what was that?
Sorry, Mom! I'll clean that up!
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 妈妈！我会清理干净！

translation.en: [Mom] Did you make a messy?
[Hubie] I said I would clean it up! It's not a big deal!
translation.zh:
‎我说了我会清理干净！
‎不是什么大事！

translation.en: [Mom] What are you cleaning up? Did you have an accident?
translation.zh: ‎你在清理什么？发生什么意外了吗？

translation.en: [Hubie] No! It wasn't an accident.
[Mom] It was on purpose?
[Hubie] Mom!
[Violet] Okay, kids, you can't have candy for breakfast,
translation.zh: ‎好了 孩子们 早餐不能吃糖

translation.en: but you can sprinkle some on top of your cereal.
translation.zh: ‎但是可以在谷物里面撒一点

translation.en: -[girl 1] Yes! -[girl 2] Oh, yeah!
Welcome back. You're Watching Wake Up Boston.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎回来
‎大家正在收看的是《早安波士顿》

translation.en: And it's October 31st, which is a special day across the country,
translation.zh:
‎今天是10月31日
‎是整个国家的特别日子

translation.en: but most especially in Salem, America's unofficial Halloween capital.
translation.zh:
‎但尤其是在塞勒姆
‎美国非官方认证的万圣节首都

translation.en: And it's gonna be a great day in Salem. Right, Jenna Thomas?
translation.zh:
‎塞勒姆的一天会非常好
‎对吧 詹娜·托马斯？

translation.en: Yes, Erin. Clear and a balmy 61 degrees.
translation.zh: ‎是的 艾琳 晴朗温暖的16度

translation.en: Ready for trick-or-treating and all the spooky stuff.
translation.zh:
‎准备好今天的“不给糖就捣蛋”游戏
‎和各种恐怖的东西

translation.en: Ooh! Get that candy, kids.
And now, Wake Up Boston's Tracy Phillips is live with the Mayor of Salem,
translation.zh:
‎现在《早安波士顿》的特雷西·
‎菲利普斯直播对话塞勒姆市长

translation.en: David Benson, and-- Tracy, you went with Harley Quinn, too?
translation.zh:
‎大卫·本森 与…
‎特雷西 你也打扮成了“小丑女”？

translation.en: Sure did, Erin.
Only one day a year you get to show your ex what he's missin'.
translation.zh:
‎毕竟一年只有一天
‎肯定向前任展示 他错过了什么

translation.en: Hey!
You know it. Ooh! Ooh!
-Ooh! Ooh! -Yeah!
So, Mayor Benson, the sun sets in eight short hours,
translation.zh:
‎本森市长 马上还有八个小时
‎太阳就要落山了

translation.en: but the spooky preparations are in full swing around here.
translation.zh:
‎但是恐怖东西的准备
‎还在这里如火如荼地进行着

translation.en: Indeed it is, Tracy.
As you can see, we're already setting up our world-famous Halloween parade.
translation.zh:
‎大家可以看到 我们已经在准备
‎世界著名的万圣节花车游行了

translation.en: And a few blocks over, we got a street fair.
translation.zh: ‎几个街区之外 我们有一个市集

translation.en: And you're expecting some pretty impressive crowds here this evening.
translation.zh: ‎今晚能看到漂亮又震撼的人群

translation.en: Oh, we're expecting over 70,000 people to visit Salem this evening.
translation.zh:
‎今天晚上
‎我们有七万人要来塞勒姆拜访

translation.en: Well, I know where I'm gonna be tonight. Reporting from Salem, Tracy Phillips.
translation.zh:
‎我今天晚上有好去处了
‎特雷西·菲利普斯 塞勒姆报道

translation.en: -Back to you, Erin. -[marching band playing]
-[Steve] Is this the way you found him? -[man] Yeah.
And I was gonna take poor Peanut
translation.zh: ‎我打算今晚的带可怜的花生

translation.en: to the Halloween Carnival tonight for the petting zoo.
translation.zh:
‎去万圣节嘉年华
‎参加允许孩子们摸的动物园

translation.en: But what kid would wanna pet a pig that look like that?
translation.zh:
‎但是哪有孩子会想要摸
‎长成那样的猪啊？

translation.en: Did you hear anything or see anything unusual last night?
translation.zh:
‎你昨晚听到什么了吗？
‎或者有什么异常声音？

translation.en: Well, I woke up 'cause the animals sounded agitated,
translation.zh:
‎我起来了
‎因为动物们的声音听起来有点焦虑

translation.en: and then I heard poor Peanut make a God-awful squeal.
translation.zh:
‎然后我听到可怜的花生
‎特别惊恐地大叫

translation.en: Squealin' like he was callin' for his daddy!
translation.zh: ‎惊恐得 好像在喊它爸爸！

translation.en: You know what I think done it?
A werewolf.
Think you've been watching too many scary movies, Louise.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你看太多恐怖电影了 路易

translation.en: And I think you've been eating too many of your own boogers, Dan.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你吃太多自己的鼻屎了 丹

translation.en: Oh, at least my mama don't stink the toilet up so bad,
translation.zh: ‎至少我妈妈不会把厕所弄那么臭

translation.en: we gotta get rid of the shower curtain.
Oh, you gonna bring up my mama in front of the police, huh?
translation.zh: ‎你非要在警察面前提我妈妈 是吧？

translation.en: Ain't nobody say nothin' 'bout your big-ass mama.
translation.zh: ‎别人还没说你那个肥妈妈呢

translation.en: She come in the house and broke all the furniture.
translation.zh: ‎她进来房子 弄坏了所有家具

translation.en: My mom wouldn't break up the furniture
translation.zh: ‎如果不是你从宜家买便宜货

translation.en: if you hadn't bought that cheap Ikea stuff and put it together with a butter knife!
translation.zh: ‎然后用抹黄油的刀组装 ‎我妈妈就不会弄坏家具了

translation.en: Well, if I had a real man, then I wouldn't have to do it myself now, would I?
translation.zh:
‎如果我家有真男人
‎我就不用自己动手了 不是吗？

translation.en: [Dan] Peanut's dead!
We gonna eat Peanut tonight!
[man] Look at these nerds.
Unbelievable. You can say a lot of things about me, I was never a nerd.
translation.zh:
‎难以置信 你可以给我取很多绰号
‎但我绝对不是呆子

translation.en: Hey, pimples!
Pubie!
Pubie? Uh, who's-- who's Pubie?
You are, Pubie. Landolfa called you that yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎你是 怂逼 兰道尔法昨天这样叫你的

translation.en: Hilarious.
Janitor, some drunk guy dressed as Captain Underpants
translation.zh:
‎杰内特 几个人喝多了
‎打扮成内裤超人的样子

translation.en: just threw up in the jail exhibit.
That's my cue. Call me if you get lonely, Violet.
translation.zh:
‎我该走了 维奥蕾特
‎如果你感到孤独了 给我打电话

translation.en: Don't call me.
Wasn't plannin' on it. Hey, Dot.
translation.zh: ‎我没有这个打算 喂 多特

translation.en: So, I saw there were massive lines out front.
I took the liberty to print up some happy Halloween word searches.
translation.zh:
‎我就自作主张
‎印了一些万圣节快乐的搜索词汇

translation.en: You can pass it out to the kids.
Give them something to do while they're waiting.
translation.zh: ‎给他们等待的时候找点事做

translation.en: Oh, Hubie, how lovely.
Thank you so much.
Of course.
So, Violet Valentine.
Good to see you. Happy Halloween.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴见到你 万圣节快乐

translation.en: -Thank you. -What brings you here?
I am chaperoning my daughter's field trip.
She's over there. Danielle! Danielle!
Say hello to Hubie.
Hi, Hubie. What school do you go to?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 修比 你读哪所学校？

translation.en: No. He's a grown man. I've known him since kindergarten.
translation.zh:
‎不是 他是成年人
‎我从幼儿园就认识他了

translation.en: Yes. We had Miss Colestice's class together.
translation.zh: ‎对 我们一起上克雷斯蒂老师的课

translation.en: -Yes, we did. -You were the first kid to get earrings.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-你是第一个戴耳环的孩子

translation.en: [chuckles] I was.
Oh, I'm sorry. I just thought 'cause of the thermos.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我以为你是学生
‎因为你拿了一个保温杯

translation.en: Oh, why? Do you want some soup?
-Uh, no, thanks. -Your friends?
translation.zh:
‎-不用了 谢谢
‎-你的朋友们呢？

translation.en: All right. It's here if you want it.
translation.zh: ‎好 如果你们想要 随时找我

translation.en: -[laughing] What was that? -What was that about?
What a nice young lady. I remember you just had a foster son.
translation.zh:
‎真是友善的小姑娘
‎我记得你有一个养子

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I've got two foster daughters now as well.
translation.zh: ‎对 我现在还有两个养女

translation.en: Huh. That's quite commendable.
Looking out for the community. That's important.
translation.zh: ‎照顾这里生活的人 太重要了

translation.en: Of course. That's my great-great-great-great-great grandmother.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 那是我的曾曾曾曾曾祖母

translation.en: She saw some bad things happening, but she spoke out.
translation.zh: ‎她看到有坏事发生 但她说出来了

translation.en: Said there's no such thing as witches.
-Very brave. -Yeah, maybe too brave.
translation.zh:
‎-好勇敢
‎-对 或许过于勇敢了

translation.en: 'Cause they called her a witch and ended up like this fella.
translation.zh:
‎因为他们管她叫女巫
‎后来就像这家伙一样

translation.en: -[Violet] Ooh. -[Hubie] The unfortunate dangling Dave.
God, I love the way you phrase things.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我喜欢你说话的方式

translation.en: Okay.
So, how are you and Officer Steve doing? I saw him yesterday in his squad car.
translation.zh:
‎你和史蒂夫警官怎么样了？
‎我昨天在警车里看到他了

translation.en: We were talking shop. Penal code 10-4, 10-5. That kinda thing.
translation.zh:
‎我们聊了聊工作
‎你知道的 104法条 105法条那些

translation.en: Well, since we've been divorced four years,
-I don't really know how he's doing. -Oh, well, don't lose faith.
translation.zh:
‎-我不太清楚他最近怎么样
‎-别放弃信念

translation.en: You guys will get through this rough patch.
Did you hear about the Andersons?
I met the fellow who moved into their home. A Walter Lambert.
translation.zh:
‎我见到了搬进他们家的人
‎沃特·兰伯特

translation.en: Seems like a decent guy.
-[Violet] Walter Lambert? -Yeah.
There's a Walter Lambert buried right near my grandpa in the Pine Street Cemetery.
translation.zh:
‎我爷爷在松果街墓地埋葬的地方
‎旁边就埋了一个叫沃特·兰伯特的人

translation.en: Okay.
I only remember that name because there is something off about his tombstone.
translation.zh:
‎我记得这个名字
‎因为他的墓碑有些诡异

translation.en: -Off how? -Well, I know you, Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么诡异了？
‎-我了解你 修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -You'll see.
Okay.
♪ Did you ever know That you're my hero? ♪
translation.zh: ‎你是否知道 你是我的英雄？

translation.en: ♪ And everything I'd like to be? ♪
♪ I could fly higher than an eagle ♪
♪ 'Cause you are the wind Beneath my wings ♪
♪ Did you ever know That you're my hero? ♪
translation.zh: ‎你是否知道 你是我的英雄？

translation.en: ♪ You're everything, everything I wish I could be ♪
♪ I could fly higher than an eagle… ♪
translation.zh: ‎我可以比雄鹰飞得高 ‎（沃特·兰伯特 儿子）

translation.en: What is that fool doing here?
No clue.
-You want me to kick his ass, Father? -Not yet. But stay close.
translation.zh:
‎-父亲 要让我教训他一顿吗？
‎-先不用 但是盯紧他

translation.en: That concludes our service.
The family has invited you all to a luncheon.
translation.zh: ‎家属邀请你们所有人享用午宴

translation.en: A luncheon at the, uh, Captain's Table on Foster Street. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎午宴在福斯特街上
‎“船长的餐桌” 谢谢

translation.en: He never died?
Boobie! What are you doing?
Nothing. What are you doing?
I'm officiating a funeral.
On Halloween?
People die every day, dummy. They don't skip holidays.
translation.zh: ‎哪一天都会有人死 蠢货 不分节假日

translation.en: -Even April Fool's Day? -Shut it.
And if you get dirt on my good funeral shoes again,
translation.zh: ‎如果你再让我的葬礼鞋粘上泥土

translation.en: I'm gonna bury one up your butt.
Okay. You want some soup?
No, I don't want some s--
-Good to wash off the dirt. -Here, let me help you.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴能洗净灰尘
‎-来 让我帮你

translation.en: Oh, is this--
Condolences, by the way.
And I love the Wicked Witch costume. It's classic.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢这个坏女巫节日服装 很经典

translation.en: It's not a costume.
Not a costume? Okay. My boner.
translation.zh: ‎不是节日服装？好吧 我糗了

translation.en: [woman] Why he talk about his boner?
Hello, Hubes. What did you do wrong?
translation.zh: ‎你好 小修比 你做错什么了？

translation.en: I don't think anything.
By the way, I wanted to say that I'm sorry
translation.zh: ‎对了 那天在熟食窗口的事

translation.en: for my attitude yesterday at the deli counter.
[stammers] My dad, you know, he died unexpected,
translation.zh: ‎你也知道 我父亲突然意外去世

translation.en: and I just haven't been myself these past few days.
translation.zh: ‎我过去几天一直都不太像我自己

translation.en: This is your dad's funeral? I'm so sorry. I didn't--
translation.zh: ‎这是你父亲的葬礼？抱歉 我不知道…

translation.en: My father passed away a couple of years ago.
It is very painful. It's--
-Ups and downs, emotionally. -Yeah. My dad was a serious man.
translation.zh:
‎-经历了情感上的过山车
‎-对 我父亲是个很正经的人

translation.en: He worked hard every single day of his life.
translation.zh: ‎他这一辈子 每天都在努力工作

translation.en: -But he did love to laugh. -Okay.
And I know he would get a great chuckle out of this.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 他肯定会因为这个大笑的

translation.en: Have fun, Pubes.
Ma! He's an idiota, deficiente!
translation.zh: ‎妈妈！他就是个蠢货 有病！

translation.en: Disrespectful?
No, this is good.
We want him in the hole.
God would want this.
Somebody's down here!
Ah! The dead speak!
-[thuds] -[Hubie] Oh, my soup!
[Aurora on radio] It's not even dark yet here in Salem,
but the spooky vibes are gettin' heavy, baby.
translation.zh:
‎但是恐怖的的气氛
‎已经开始浓重起来了 宝贝

translation.en: We'll get through it together here on…
♪ WCC8 ♪
[woman, in a spooky voice] Halloween central.
[Hubie] Mr. Lambert.
What are you up to?
Hubie. Yeah.
I wa--
Last night, I thought I felt a little draft. So…
translation.zh: ‎昨晚我感觉有一点漏风 所以…

translation.en: Yeah, that October wind will-- it'll sneak up on you.
translation.zh: ‎对 十月的风会… 偷偷钻进房间

translation.en: Sure does.
Say, Mr. Lambert.
How old are you?
You mean in human years?
Yes.
I don't really believe in keeping track of that kind of thing, Hubie.
translation.zh: ‎我不太喜欢记着那种东西 修比

translation.en: You know, age is just a state of mind.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 年龄只是精神状态的象征

translation.en: That's why I played T-ball till I was 25.
translation.zh: ‎所以我25岁之前 一直玩儿童棒球

translation.en: Hubie Dubois.
I can't believe it's finally Halloween.
translation.zh: ‎我真不敢相信 终于到了万圣节

translation.en: My parents got me a royal princess dress from the Disney Store.
translation.zh:
‎我父母给我从迪士尼商店
‎买了一件漂亮的皇室公主裙

translation.en: -Cooky, what are you gonna dress up as? -A robot.
translation.zh:
‎-库奇 你要打扮成什么？
‎-机器人

translation.en: You should go as a girl who doesn't even know who her real parents are.
translation.zh:
‎你应该打扮成一个
‎不知道自己亲生父母是谁的女孩

translation.en: Oh, that's who you are every day.
translation.zh: ‎对了 那就是你每天的样子

translation.en: [woman] O'Doyle!
-[pounds] -[Andy] Yes, Miss Taylor?
Maybe you should go as a butt-faced, red-haired piece of dog puke
translation.zh:
‎或许你应该打扮成一个丑陋的红头发
‎狗的呕吐物

translation.en: who's reading at a second-grade level even though he's 11.
translation.zh:
‎虽然已经11岁了
‎读书能力还停留在二年级水平

translation.en: [man] Attention, first through sixth graders.
We have a special presentation today in lieu of recess.
translation.zh:
‎我们今天的课间
‎要进行一场特殊的展示

translation.en: Here again to talk about Halloween safety
is Salem's Official Volunteer Halloween Helper,
translation.zh: ‎塞勒姆的万圣节助手官方志愿者

translation.en: Hubert Dubois.
Oh, God.
[girl] Are those pee stains?
Hello, Webster Elementary School.
translation.zh: ‎韦伯斯特小学的同学们 大家好

translation.en: I am not a ghost, but I play one on TV.
translation.zh: ‎我不是鬼 但我在电视上扮演鬼

translation.en: Just playing.
My name is Hubie Dubois, and I am here to tell you that Halloween is fun,
translation.zh:
‎我的名字叫修比·杜布瓦 我
‎在这里想告诉大家 万圣节是有趣的

translation.en: but we must stay out of the danger zone.
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Let him speak. He's a human being!
Thank you, sir. I would like a word with you all.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你 先生
‎我想跟你们所有人说句话

translation.en: And that word is…
G-ghost?
Ghost. Scary. But also the key to Halloween safety.
translation.zh: ‎鬼 恐怖 也是万圣节安全的关键

translation.en: The G.
-What could the G stand for? -Go home?
No. Give.
Give to the less fortunate. Does anyone know what less fortunate is?
translation.zh:
‎给予那些贫困的人
‎有人知道贫困是什么意思吗？

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -It means someone who needs help.
translation.zh:
‎-是 你回答
‎-意思是 需要帮助的人

translation.en: Very good. What's your name?
-Cooky. -Well, you're a smart cookie.
When I was young, I used to build a tower with all my candy.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候 会用我所有的糖堆一个塔

translation.en: And all the candy that was part of the tower before it collapsed,
translation.zh: ‎在塔倒塌前 所有组成塔的糖

translation.en: I would keep for myself.
The leftover candy, I would donate to the homeless shelter.
translation.zh: ‎剩下的糖 我会捐献给收容中心

translation.en: Is that where you live?
Well, son--
Burn him!
I'm sorry, son. I just--
translation.zh: ‎对不起 孩子 我只是…

translation.en: Please-- please don't cry.
I feel bad for him.
Yeah. No, baby. He overstayed his welcome.
translation.zh: ‎对 没事 宝贝 他讲话太久了

translation.en: We're out of food, I guess. Yeah?
Hey. What can I get you guys?
Hi. Can I get a black coffee?
Coffee?
-Not hot chocolate? -Oh, I don't drink hot chocolate anymore.
translation.zh:
‎-不要热巧克力？
‎-不 我不再喝热巧克力了

translation.en: -You had one this morning. -Well, I quit.
translation.zh:
‎-你今天早上喝了
‎-对 我戒了

translation.en: Okay. Well, I'm gonna need to see some ID, freshman.
translation.zh: ‎好 我需要看一下你的身份证 新生

translation.en: [stammers] ID? I don't…
[chuckles] I'm just kidding. One black coffee.
translation.zh: ‎我开玩笑的 一杯黑咖啡

translation.en: So, how'd you know I was a freshman?
Oh, I see you in the hallways
and it's pretty obvious. What are you guys doing for Halloween?
translation.zh: ‎很明显 你们万圣节做什么？

translation.en: Well, I'm taking my sisters trick-or-treating.
translation.zh:
‎要带妹妹们玩
‎“不给糖就捣蛋”游戏

translation.en: And my mom's at work, so I kind of run the house when she's gone.
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈工作
‎所以她不在的时候 我要好好看家

translation.en: -So, you're not going to the party? -Yeah, I'm going.
-Which party? -One manly black coffee.
translation.zh:
‎-哪个派对？
‎-一杯有男子气概的黑咖啡

translation.en: That's me.
The big barn at Wallace Orchard. It's mostly juniors and seniors.
translation.zh:
‎在华雷斯果园的谷仓
‎多数都是二、三年级学生

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. Well, maybe after my mom comes home, I'll-- I'll try to swing by.
translation.zh:
‎好 或许等我妈妈回家后
‎我试试过去看看

translation.en: Try hard.
Did you suddenly get cool?
Sorry, freshman.
Michael Mundi in the house!
It comes and goes.
[Aurora on radio] Well, all you witches and warlocks, the daylight is fading,
translation.zh: ‎各位女巫和术士们 日光正在退去

translation.en: and you know what that means. Halloween in Salem is in full effect.
translation.zh:
‎你们知道这意味着什么
‎塞勒姆的万圣节全面开启

translation.en: Now, we have an old friend on the line, Hubie Dubie.
translation.zh:
‎我们连接了一位老朋友
‎修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: [echoing] Hi, I like-- I wanna make a request, please?
translation.zh: ‎你好 我想… 我有一个请求

translation.en: If you can play the theme song
from the film Ghostbusters by Ray Parker Jr.
[Aurora] Hubie, you need to turn down your radio.
translation.zh: ‎修比 你需要关掉收音机

translation.en: -We talked about this before. -[echoing] I just keep hearing myself.
translation.zh:
‎-我们之前说过
‎-我一直能听到自己的声音

translation.en: -[Aurora] Hubie. -Okay, there it is.
Thank you, Aurora.
-[Aurora] Turn down the radio. -["Ghostbusters" playing]
[echoing] Who is that?
-[Aurora] Just hang up your phone. -[echoing] Please stop.
-That's not funny. -[Aurora] All good, baby, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-一点都不好笑
‎-一切都好 好吗？

translation.en: -[Aurora] Thanks for calling. -[Hubie] Sit on it, pal.
That man on the radio sounds like the guy who talked to us in the cafeteria today.
translation.zh:
‎那个人听起来
‎像今天在餐厅给我们讲话的人呢

translation.en: Oh, did you get a Hubie Dubois Halloween safety talk?
translation.zh:
‎你们听修比·杜布瓦
‎关于安全的演讲了？

translation.en: I think so. Is he a good guy?
translation.zh: ‎也应该是 他是个好人吗？

translation.en: 'Cause the whole school was throwing food and sharp objects at him.
translation.zh:
‎因为整个学校都在往他身上
‎扔食物和尖锐的物品

translation.en: Hubie Dubois is probably the nicest guy in this town.
translation.zh:
‎修比·杜布瓦可能是
‎这个城市最善良的人

translation.en: Do you like him?
No. He-- You know, he's just--
translation.zh: ‎不 他… 你知道 他只是…

translation.en: -He's the nicest. -You said this already.
Well, take it from me. Nice matters.
[Aurora] The scariest night of the year has arrived, kiddies.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 一年中最恐怖的夜晚来了

translation.en: It's gonna be a full moon, so the monsters will be out.
translation.zh: ‎今晚会是满月 所以怪物会跑出来

translation.en: I hope you've made all the necessary preparations.
translation.zh: ‎希望你做好了所有必须的准备

translation.en: And have your costumes all picked out.
And watch out for all kinds of freaky things
that'll chill you to the bone.
Oh, Hubie. Don't go out there tonight.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 修比 今晚别出去

translation.en: I have a feeling something's going to happen.
translation.zh: ‎我有一种预感 会发生什么事

translation.en: I get that feeling every time I leave the house, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎我每次离开家 都有这种预感 妈

translation.en: But Salem needs me.
Listen to me. It's time to worry about yourself.
translation.zh: ‎听我说 是时候该担心你自己了

translation.en: Hubert Shubert Dubois, do you hear me?
translation.zh:
‎修比尔特·舒伯特·杜布瓦
‎你听到我说话了吗？

translation.en: The whole neighborhood'll hear you, Ma. You're practically screaming.
translation.zh:
‎整个街区都听到你了 妈
‎你就是在喊啊

translation.en: I'll be okay.
-My sweet boy. -[Hubie] I love you.
Answer the door if it's a trick-or-treater.
translation.zh: ‎如果是来要糖的 记得开门

translation.en: Otherwise, just stay in the house, Ma.
translation.zh: ‎如果不是 就留在房子里 妈

translation.en: So, you went with the full moon, huh, God?
translation.zh: ‎你和满月一起玩呢 上帝？

translation.en: It's on.
[Hubie] Be careful, guys! Safety first!
-Incredible costumes, guys. -[girl] Whatever.
Well, not on my watch, Mr. Whiskers.
translation.zh: ‎威斯克先生 在我的监视下 一切安好

translation.en: Hey, Pubie! Give me back my cat!
translation.zh: ‎嗨 怂逼！把我的猫还给我

translation.en: Boy, that nickname spread like warm peanut butter.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 这个绰号真是一传十 十传百

translation.en: [Violet] Hey, Karen.
How 'bout you thank the man?
Oh, hey, Violet.
Oh, you fostering this mumbling zombie now, too? [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎你现在也领养
‎这个喃喃自语的僵尸了？

translation.en: Good luck!
You want me to get out this car and beat you with that ugly cat?
translation.zh:
‎你想让我下车
‎把你和那只丑猫打一顿吗？

translation.en: 'Cause you know I'm more than capable of it.
translation.zh: ‎因为你知道 我想做这个 轻而易举

translation.en: Uh… no.
Violet Valentine. What a, uh, pleasant surprise.
translation.zh: ‎维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁 真是愉快的惊喜

translation.en: How did you get to be so badass?
Yes, you, Hubie. You're a stud.
translation.zh: ‎对 就是你 修比 你很迷人啊

translation.en: You're most friendly, most popular, and best looking.
translation.zh: ‎你曾是最友好、最受欢迎、最漂亮

translation.en: What?
I was wondering, Violet, do you think perhaps that we can--
translation.zh:
‎维奥蕾特 我想问你
‎你觉得或许我们可以…

translation.en: Maybe sometime you and I could possibly…
What?
Nothing.
Nothing at all.
Okay. Well, I know it's your big night, Hubie.
translation.zh: ‎好 修比 我知道今晚你会很忙

translation.en: So, if you run out of soup and you need a refill, just stop by the diner.
translation.zh:
‎如果你的汤喝完了 需要添加
‎来我们晚餐店

translation.en: I'm working all night, okay?
Right-o.
Okay.
I'm asexual, but that girl's making me hella horny.
translation.zh:
‎我有性冷淡
‎但是那个女孩让我好饥渴

translation.en: Go, go, go.
Go get candy, baby.
Okay.
I'm gonna stop you there, young lady.
Part of the fun of Halloween is its ways of teaching us life lessons.
translation.zh:
‎万圣节的一个乐趣
‎就是它怎样教会我们人生道理

translation.en: -To trust the honor system. -[animatronic creature] Hello!
[Hubie] Help me!
[laughs] You're a dummy!
Scooby Dubois on the case!
Mr. Hennessy. How's night school?
translation.zh: ‎轩尼斯先生 夜校怎么样？

translation.en: I dropped out three years ago. Shut up.
translation.zh: ‎我三年前就退校了 闭嘴

translation.en: [Hennessy] Hi, David. Hi, Tracy.
translation.zh: ‎你们好 大卫 特雷西

translation.en: -[Tracy] Hi. -[David] How are ya?
Hubie, nice little sash you got on there. What is that, monitor?
translation.zh:
‎修比 你这个绶带不错啊
‎那是什么？“监督”？

translation.en: What're you monitorizing?
You see, basically, doing a door-to-door candy etiquette.
translation.zh: ‎你看 基本就是一家一家拜访的礼仪

translation.en: As a trained volunteer, I've been asked to initiate spot checks.
translation.zh:
‎作为受过训练的志愿者
‎他们求我进行抽查

translation.en: -Asked by who? -[Hennessy] Yeah.
It looks like you made that sash from one of your mother's scarves.
translation.zh:
‎因为感觉你这个绶带
‎是你妈妈的旧围巾做的

translation.en: My family's been a part of Salem for, uh, going back to the witch trials.
translation.zh:
‎我们家族扎根在塞勒姆
‎从17世纪末就开始了

translation.en: So, I know what it's like when the spooky fun gets outta hand--
translation.zh:
‎所以恐怖的乐趣变味失控的时候
‎我能感觉到

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
I had this nightmare I was talking to an idiot.
translation.zh:
‎我做了一个噩梦
‎梦里和一个蠢货聊天

translation.en: Mmm. Havin' a nightmare about your hairdo.
[Tracy and David] Come on, baby.
[Hubie] Good night. Please keep the fishnets for fishing next year.
translation.zh: ‎晚安 你们把渔网留着明年捕鱼

translation.en: You know what spooky fun is really getting outta hand?
translation.zh:
‎你知道什么恐怖的乐趣
‎真正变味失控了吗？

translation.en: It's your new neighbor's house.
I heard some odd noises when I was walking by.
translation.zh: ‎我路过的时候 听到了奇怪的噪声

translation.en: -Noises, huh? -Yeah.
Let's break this down. Did it sound like this?
translation.zh:
‎我们来慢慢分析
‎听起来像这个声音吗？

translation.en: -That sounds like a donkey. No. -How about…
translation.zh:
‎-这个听起来像驴 不是
‎-那这个呢…

translation.en: -No. -[squeaking]
-No. -[grunting]
I don't know. It was a noise!
-Okay? -Yeah.
-Why don't you just go see what it is? -On it.
translation.zh:
‎-不如你自己去看看是什么？
‎-马上去

translation.en: [Hubie] Mr. Lambert? Mr. Lambert?
Mr. Lambert?
[Hubie] Hello?
[Hubie] Mr. Lamb--
Why?
What the--
You got a dog, Mr. Lambert?
You got a big dog, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: ‎你养了一条大狗吗 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
I know you said if there was a commotion, I should ignore it.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你说过
‎如果有骚乱 我应该忽视

translation.en: But there was a commotion, and I did not ignore it. And--
translation.zh: ‎但确实有骚乱 我没有忽视 然后…

translation.en: Were those your feces on the newspaper, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: ‎那报纸上是你的屎吗 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: [rumbling, gasping] Walter.
Safe Halloween, Mr.--
Walter!
Look, I know it was just a pig.
Peanut was not just a pig, officer. He was my best friend.
translation.zh:
‎花生不只是一头猪 警官
‎它是我最好的朋友

translation.en: -I thought I was your best friend. -[scoffs]
Here's what I'm thinkin'. Name Richie Hartman ring a bell?
translation.zh:
‎我是这样想的
‎理查·哈特曼这个名字 你记得吗？

translation.en: Richie Hartman?
Everybody knows who he is.
I don't. Who is he? One of your boyfriend?
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 他是谁？
‎你的一个男朋友吗？

translation.en: [Louise] Oh, you jealous now?
Why don't you go cuddle up with your best friend, Peanut, huh?
translation.zh:
‎你怎么不去
‎拥抱你最好的朋友花生呢？

translation.en: [Dan crying] You see this, officer?
-I wanna press charges. -Oh, you gotta be kidding me.
[Louise] And I wanna press your face against that radiator!
translation.zh: ‎我想把你的脸按到那个暖气上！

translation.en: -[Hubie] Officer Steve! -I'm sorry, buddy.
The package got by me. He moves quickly to the left.
translation.zh: ‎这个包裹直接越过我 快速向左转了

translation.en: Okay, well, how did the package even know that I was in here?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 这个包裹怎么知道
‎我在这里的呢？

translation.en: Well, that's a glass window. The package could see ya.
translation.zh: ‎这是玻璃窗 这个包裹还能看到你

translation.en: Yeah, but could've told the package that I'm a mannequin or somethin'.
translation.zh:
‎对 但你可以告诉这家伙
‎这里坐的是个假人之类的

translation.en: -You're right. -What is this package they talkin' about?
translation.zh:
‎-你说得对
‎-他们说的包裹是什么？

translation.en: -My bad. -Guess they're talkin' about this fella.
translation.zh:
‎-是我的错
‎-应该说的是这位朋友

translation.en: Pubie?
I don't know his name. The goofy idiot from the supermarket deli.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道他叫什么
‎超市熟食柜台那个蠢货

translation.en: Dan, Louise, let's table this discussion for a moment, okay?
translation.zh:
‎丹 路易
‎我们的谈话先推迟一下 好吗？

translation.en: -To be continued, I guess. -[Louise] Oh, you guess?
translation.zh:
‎-我猜就要下次继续了吧
‎-你猜？

translation.en: I wish it was you that was knifed up instead of peanut.
translation.zh:
‎我真希望被刀子刺伤的是你
‎不是花生

translation.en: You hear this? Can I borrow your gun?
translation.zh: ‎你听到了吗？可以借你的枪吗？

translation.en: I assure you can arrest me right afterwards.
translation.zh: ‎我保证 你可以之后立刻逮捕我

translation.en: [Louise] Cut your gizzards off. That's what I should do.
translation.zh: ‎我最应该把你的蛋蛋切下来

translation.en: Officer Steve, I saw my ne--
translation.zh: ‎史蒂夫警官 我看到我的…

translation.en: Never mind that. Cop a squat.
-Here? -Yeah.
Hubie, how long have you lived in Salem?
translation.zh: ‎修比 你在塞勒姆生活多久了？

translation.en: Eh, my whole life.
Now, you've brought us many instances of unlawful conduct
translation.zh: ‎你在这些年中 让很多次不法行为

translation.en: to our attention over the years.
Somebody put a firecracker in my mail slot.
There's a diaper in Dori's pond.
translation.zh: ‎多利的池塘中间有一个尿不湿

translation.en: There's a weird station wagon at the senior center.
translation.zh: ‎老年中心有一个奇怪的小旅行车

translation.en: The supermarket is selling expired bacon.
Janet at the library has not been herself lately.
translation.zh: ‎图书管的詹内特最近表现很不像自己

translation.en: I heard a voice in the sewer.
translation.zh: ‎我听到下水道里有人的声音

translation.en: I'm sorry. I didn't recognize him.
The power of observation, the ability to blend in.
translation.zh: ‎观察的力量 融入的能力

translation.en: That is you in a nutshell, Hubie.
Well, Steven, let's talk turkey.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 史蒂夫 这倒是事实

translation.en: May I?
Mmm… I only have 30 left.
Okay.
You ever hear of an AUU?
I don't have an Internet, so I'm not up on my latest abbreviations.
translation.zh:
‎我家没有网络
‎我对最近的流行用语不了解

translation.en: Illuminate me.
AUU stands for "Auxiliary Undercover Unit."
-Now, before you get too excited, -[exhaling]
let me tell you what it entails, okay?
translation.zh: ‎让我告诉你它包含的责任 好吗？

translation.en: First off, there's no salary.
-[exhales] -There's no badge.
-[exhales] -We can't acknowledge you officially -in any way whatsoever. And-- -[exhaling]
translation.zh:
‎我们无法在官方
‎以任何方式承认你 然后…

translation.en: And the most important thing is
you can never be seen talking to me or any other officer in this place.
translation.zh:
‎你永远不能被别人看到和我
‎或者这个警局里的任何一个人讲话

translation.en: A question. How would I go about getting the information to you?
translation.zh: ‎我有问题 那我怎么传达信息给你？

translation.en: Oh, you just keep a log. A very detailed log.
translation.zh: ‎你写日志就行 一个非常详细的日志

translation.en: And you drop that log right here.
In the garbage can directly outside Town Hall.
translation.zh: ‎就在市政厅外面的垃圾箱里

translation.en: So, drop a log in a garbage can?
Well, that garbage can, that's monitored, 24-7.
translation.zh: ‎那个垃圾箱是24小时受到监控的

translation.en: So, any intel that you have, it's gonna get to us. We'll know about it.
translation.zh:
‎所以你的任何信息
‎都会传达给我们 我们会知道

translation.en: -Makes-- makes sense. -Yep.
But remember, you cannot contact us, no matter how dire the emergency.
translation.zh:
‎但是记住 不管是多么紧急的情况
‎你都不能联系我们

translation.en: -Yeah, I heard you the first time. -Yeah, I said it twice, it's important.
translation.zh: ‎是 我刚才已经听到你说了 ‎好 我说两次 是因为很重要

translation.en: -Gotcha. -So, you ready to join the team?
translation.zh:
‎-懂了
‎-你准备好加入团队了吗？

translation.en: Put me in, coach. I'm ready to play.
translation.zh:
‎让我加入 长官
‎我已经准备好开始工作了

translation.en: [Steve] All right!
Perfect.
Tommy, I want mom to bring half my candy to the homeless shelter in the morning.
translation.zh:
‎汤米 我想让妈妈把我一半的糖
‎在早上送到收容中心

translation.en: Will you tell her when she gets home?
translation.zh: ‎等她回家 你可以告诉她吗？

translation.en: Tommy?
Tommy!
Tommy?
Tommy, where are you?
Danielle! Mom isn't home yet, and I can't find Tommy. I'm scared.
translation.zh:
‎黛妮尔！妈妈还没有回来
‎我也找不到汤米 我好害怕

translation.en: -Did you check the basement? -I checked everywhere. He's not here.
translation.zh:
‎-你看过地下室了吗？
‎-所有地方都看过了 他没在这里

translation.en: You know what that means? Our brother's in love.
translation.zh:
‎你知道这意味着什么吗？
‎意味着我们哥哥坠入爱河了

translation.en: Ew!
♪ Ghosts and goblins very scary ♪
♪ Wolfman's back is very hairy… ♪
How we doin', ladies?
Great, Freddie Mercury.
So lit to have freshman girls here. New crop of hotties to hit on.
translation.zh:
‎这里有新生学妹 真是太酷了
‎有一批新的美女庄稼可以收割

translation.en: Hey! Easy, Mikey. My sister's a freshman.
translation.zh: ‎喂！别激动  迈克 我妹妹是新生

translation.en: Dude, I would never even consider your sister in that way.
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 我不会那样看待你妹妹

translation.en: She's got no personality and a greasy forehead.
translation.zh: ‎她没有个性 额头油腻腻

translation.en: You're a good friend, man.
Hi.
Didn't I see you on Union Street a couple of hours ago trick-or-treating?
translation.zh:
‎我是不是几个小时之前去要糖的时候
‎在联合街见过你？

translation.en: Well, I had to take out my two new sisters, remember?
translation.zh:
‎我要带着两个新妹妹去要糖
‎记得吗？

translation.en: I don't know. I thought I saw you hold open your bag to get some candy.
translation.zh:
‎好像不是吧
‎我记得看到你包口大开 要糖呢

translation.en: That's not babysitting, that's trick-or-treating.
translation.zh: ‎那可不是照顾妹妹 你就是在要糖

translation.en: Oh, my God. I know, I know. It's so pathetic.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我知道 太可悲了

translation.en: It's not pathetic.
If you brought me a Kit Kat bar.
translation.zh: ‎如果你能给我拿一个奇巧威化

translation.en: Well, I have a few.
♪ Dancing with the Devil ♪
-Excuse me. Smokers for chokers. -[glass shatters]
translation.zh: ‎打扰一下 吸烟让人窒息

translation.en: -What's your problem? -I got a problem?
I think you got the problem.
How we doing, guys?
-[man 1] What's up, old man? -Got some ID for that drink?
translation.zh:
‎-你好 老头
‎-你喝那杯酒 有身份证吗？

translation.en: -What? -Yeah, not on my watch.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-对 我看到了就不行

translation.en: -What the hell? -It's for the best.
And I think we are gonna dehydrate. Let's break that up.
translation.zh: ‎你们要缺水了 先分开一下

translation.en: -Watch it, GI Jackass. -[man 2] You wanna die?
translation.zh:
‎-小心点 混蛋督察队的
‎-你想死吗？

translation.en: Not yet.
Uh, excuse me, Grandpa Thermos, you need to leave the party right now.
translation.zh:
‎不好意思 保温杯老爷爷
‎你需要立刻离开派对

translation.en: Leave public property? I don't see that happening.
translation.zh: ‎离开这个公共场所？我不这样想

translation.en: Leave. Or I'll beat you with a tire iron.
translation.zh: ‎走 不然我就用轮胎扳手打你

translation.en: You and whose army?
Just me.
-And me. -And me.
-And me. -And definitely me.
-Let's kill him! -[all clamoring] Yeah! Yeah!
Hang on! All right.
I realize I might have gone too far for your teenage mental capacities
translation.zh:
‎我意识到我可能对你们
‎青少年的心里承受能力管太多了

translation.en: and that is a boner on my part.
-I don't think he knows what boner means. -No, definitely not.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得他好像不知道糗的意思
‎-肯定不知道

translation.en: When I was your age, I made some huge boners.
translation.zh:
‎我像你么这么大的时候
‎犯过几次大糗

translation.en: Boners that I wish I could get back now.
translation.zh: ‎那些糗 我现在非常希望回到过去

translation.en: Listen, give me a minute head start,
translation.zh: ‎听着 给我留一分钟时间

translation.en: then tell him there's a kid stuck in the corn maze.
translation.zh:
‎然后告诉他
‎有一个孩子困在玉米地迷宫里了

translation.en: And why am I doing that?
'Cause I am going to scare the living crap out of him.
Really? Does he scare easy?
Yes.
Yes, he does.
[Hubie] Actually, I had a good time with you guys after all.
translation.zh:
‎其实 不管怎样
‎我和你们相处的时间很愉快

translation.en: It was fun. Hope we do it again next year. Give a hoot, don't pollute.
translation.zh:
‎很开心 希望明年还可以再来
‎关心自然 远离污染

translation.en: -[coughs] Isn't that Woodsy the Owl? -No, he was Tootsie Pops.
translation.zh:
‎-那不是猫头鹰伍德西说的吗？
‎-不 是猫头鹰糖

translation.en: Hey, Mr. Pubois.
-Dubois. -Dubois.
I think I saw a little kid get lost in the Corn Maze.
translation.zh:
‎我好像看到一个孩子
‎在玉米地迷宫走丢了

translation.en: In the what?
I heard him scream, "Help!" Then he started crying.
translation.zh: ‎我听到他喊“救命” 然后他就开始哭

translation.en: My God, it's just-- it's just a little kid!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 他只是一个小孩子啊

translation.en: Okay. Handle your high.
I am a member of the AUU. This is what I was trained to do.
translation.zh:
‎我是AUU成员
‎我们接受训练 就是为了做这种事

translation.en: I think we're good!
Messing with Shoobie Dubois. A Salem tradition.
translation.zh: ‎耍混蛋·杜布瓦 是塞勒姆的传统

translation.en: My grandma gave him his first titty-twister.
translation.zh: ‎我奶奶是第一个拧他乳头的人

translation.en: -What a bunch of jerks. -Should we go tell him it's a prank?
translation.zh:
‎-真是一群混蛋
‎-我们应该告诉他 真是恶作剧吗？

translation.en: I knew I liked you, freshman. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道我喜欢你 新生 走吧

translation.en: Excuse me, excuse me, Bride of Skankenstein. Yeah, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎让一下 科学怪人的缺德新娘
‎好 谢谢

translation.en: If you can hear me, please call out so I can determine your whereabouts!
translation.zh:
‎如果你能听到我说话 你就大喊
‎好让我知道你在哪里

translation.en: Do not be fearful, little one!
Announce yourself!
[girl] Hubie!
[Tommy] Mr. Dubois!
[girl] Hubie!
[Tommy] Hello!
-Where are you? -Should we split up?
I don't know. That sounds like a big boner.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 听起来有点糗

translation.en: -What? -I'm just kidding.
[Hubie] Is anyone out there? Sound off!
Tonight's temperatures will dip below 28 degrees!
translation.zh: ‎今晚的气温将会下降到零下二度

translation.en: Your nervous system cannot handle that!
Sasquatch could not handle that!
[girl] Mr. Dubois? Hello!
Hey, Tommy, hey!
-Mr. Dubois! [screams] -[laughs]
What the hell, Mike? Why would you do that?
translation.zh: ‎什么鬼 迈克？你为什么这样？

translation.en: Hey, whoa! I'm sorry. Come on, I couldn't resist.
translation.zh: ‎哇！抱歉 拜托 我忍不住吓别人

translation.en: [Tommy] That wasn't cool, man.
Hey, coffee boy.
You're that freshman, right?
Uh, yeah.
Yeah, well, welcome to your first high school fight.
translation.zh: ‎好 那欢迎你来到高中第一场打架

translation.en: [girl] Tommy!
Megan McNally, you like underclassmen?
translation.zh: ‎梅根·麦克奈丽 你喜欢学弟？

translation.en: Oh, that's adorable.
[Hubie] Hello!
Is the fight over? Did I win?
Yeah, yeah. Yeah, you kicked his ass. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎对 你打败了他 走吧

translation.en: [Hubie] Is anyone out there? Sound off!
[high-pitched voice] Help!
Remain in place! I will find you!
Not if I find you first! [snickers]
translation.zh: ‎如果我先找到你 就另当别论了

translation.en: Take me, evil one! Just do not harm the child!
translation.zh:
‎有本事来找我 坏人！
‎不要伤害那个孩子！

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] Help, Hubie!
No!
Dad? Is that you?
Does Mom know you're still alive?
Are you still mad at me?
No. It's Tommy, Violet Valentine's son.
translation.zh:
‎不 我是汤米
‎维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁的儿子

translation.en: Yeah, and Megan. I work down at the coffee shop.
translation.zh: ‎对 我是梅根 我在街南的咖啡厅工作

translation.en: I give you free hot water for your dehydrated soup sometimes.
translation.zh:
‎我有时候会给你缺水的汤
‎加一杯免费热水

translation.en: Yes. Much appreciated.
The reason I take it for free is 'cause I don't have money.
translation.zh: ‎我免费拿的原因是我没有钱

translation.en: Anyway, we came over here to tell you that there's no lost kid.
translation.zh:
‎总之 我们过来 是想告诉你
‎这里没有走丢的孩子

translation.en: No one's lost?
Yeah, it's just Mike Mundi trying to pull a prank on you.
translation.zh: ‎对 是迈克·蒙迪想用恶作剧捉弄你

translation.en: Prank? No, I knew that.
So, I like the costumes.
-Garbage can? -Yeah. Tin Man.
And Red Riding Hood.
I want to be honest with you. Might not be a good year for it.
translation.zh:
‎我想对你说实话
‎今年可能对你不太好

translation.en: Um, between us, there is a man-wolf on the loose.
translation.zh: ‎这个我只告诉你 有一个狼人跑了

translation.en: Then maybe should I head inside?
A wise decision.
By the way, my mom was talking about you tonight.
translation.zh: ‎对了 我妈妈今晚还提起你了

translation.en: Your mom was talking about me?
What'd she say?
Just that you are nice.
Well, I am nice.
Because I'm not gonna tell her that you're out here playing Romeo
translation.zh:
‎因为我不会告诉她
‎你在外面扮演罗密欧

translation.en: instead of watching your two little sisters.
-Well, now I feel bad. -I know you feel bad.
translation.zh:
‎-我现在有点自责了
‎-我知道你自责

translation.en: -'Cause you got a big heart. -Thanks.
So, I'm gonna let you two guys take off without me.
translation.zh: ‎那么 我就让你们两个单独走了

translation.en: I'll give you a head start in the name of romance.
translation.zh: ‎我以浪漫的名义 让你先走

translation.en: -Okay. Go ahead, guys. Take care, now. -[Tommy] Thanks, Mr. Dubois.
translation.zh:
‎-好 走吧 二位 保重
‎-谢谢你 杜布瓦先生

translation.en: -[Megan] Happy Halloween. -Not looking, guys!
translation.zh:
‎-万圣节快乐
‎-我没看 二位

translation.en: Same corn over and over.
I should've left with the others, 'cause I have no idea where I am.
translation.zh:
‎我就应该和别人一起走
‎因为我现在不知道自己在哪里了

translation.en: So, I came from there. I already was there.
translation.zh: ‎我是从这里来的 这里已经来过了

translation.en: Can't believe I don't have a compass on my thermos.
translation.zh:
‎真不敢相信
‎我的保温杯上没有指南针

translation.en: [muffled screaming] Help me!
Michael Mundi.
[muffled screaming] Help me!
Listen, I am a fan of a Halloween zinger as much as the next guy, but…
translation.zh:
‎听着 我很喜欢万圣节惊喜
‎也很喜欢你 但是…

translation.en: What? What'd you say?
Michael? Michael!
What the--
[screaming] What?
[Aurora] It's nine o'clock in Salem, which means all you trick-or-treaters
translation.zh:
‎塞勒姆现在是九点钟
‎也就是说 小朋友们要糖的游戏

translation.en: have counted up your candy corns and are gettin' ready for bed.
translation.zh: ‎已经计算清楚了 准备好要睡觉了

translation.en: What the heck?
[Aurora] But that don't mean the fun stops for all of us.
-Hubie, I can't do this. -Michael Mundi was abducted.
translation.zh:
‎-修比 我没有时间
‎-迈克尔·蒙迪被绑架了

translation.en: I found a ticket to the drive-in at the scene.
translation.zh: ‎我在现场找到了一张汽车影院的票

translation.en: Great. Start there.
[Aurora] So, now's the time for us big boys and girls to get up to some real mischief.
translation.zh:
‎现在轮到我们大男孩和大女孩
‎去搞点恶作剧了

translation.en: [Aurora] And watch out. It's always the quiet ones who get the most naughty.
translation.zh: ‎小心 咬人的狗通常不叫

translation.en: Violet, where the hell were you? We're falling behind out there.
translation.zh:
‎维奥蕾特 你去哪里了？
‎我们这里都跟不上了

translation.en: Well, I was on the phone with the credit card company.
translation.zh: ‎我刚才在和信用卡公司通话

translation.en: They didn't know I had an extension. I'm so sorry, Mr. Tayback.
translation.zh:
‎他们不知道我延期了
‎我太抱歉了 泰白克先生

translation.en: You know how much credit card debt I'm in right now?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我现在
‎欠了多少信用卡欠款吗？

translation.en: Nobody gives a crap!
Just do your job. No breaks on Halloween.
translation.zh: ‎做你的工作 万圣节不休息

translation.en: [female voice] Your call has been forwarded to an automated--
She's not answering.
Don't worry, we'll find Tommy.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 我们会找到汤米的

translation.en: I am your father, and I demand some respect.
translation.zh:
‎我是你父亲
‎你需要对我有点最起码的尊敬

translation.en: You are grounded for the next six months.
You son of a--
-Mmm. Hey! -Hey.
So, did I miss anything?
Yeah, you just missed the best part!
The best part is spending time alone with you.
translation.zh: ‎最精彩的部分 是和你单独相处

translation.en: Did that turn you on?
How is sucking on fake fingers supposed to turn me on?
translation.zh:
‎你舔假的手指
‎怎么可能让我勾起欲火？

translation.en: Well, imagine that they're your fingers.
translation.zh: ‎你可以想象 这是你的手指

translation.en: They're men's fingers. Are you saying I have men's fingers?
translation.zh:
‎那是男人的手指
‎你是说 我的手像男人吗？

translation.en: Okay, look, I was just trying something, okay?
translation.zh:
‎好吧 别生气
‎我只是想挑逗你一下 好吗？

translation.en: -Something different. -Jeez, man.
[sighs] Remember we used to come here in high school?
translation.zh: ‎记得我们以前高中的时候来这里吗？

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Feels exactly the same, too. We got Hubie Dubois spying on everybody.
translation.zh:
‎感觉还和以前一样
‎还是有修比·杜布瓦监视着所有人

translation.en: I gotta say, it's pretty impressive how long he's been a loser.
translation.zh:
‎我不得不说 他做废物做了这么久
‎也是挺厉害的

translation.en: -I got a great idea. -[woman on-screen screaming]
It's kinda evil, but stick with me.
Now, that turns me on.
Michael Mundi.
Scheduled to come to the Creature Double Feature.
To meet who?
To kill his next victim?
-[woman] Hubie. -[screaming] Murder!
You okay, big man?
Mrs. Hennessy.
I am actually doing a follow-up on a classified situation.
translation.zh: ‎我其实在追查一个经典的情况

translation.en: Did you lose your thermos or some shit?
translation.zh: ‎你丢了保温杯 还是什么东西？

translation.en: Oh, that'll never happen.
Anyway, I saw something earlier.
translation.zh: ‎总之 我刚才看到了一件事

translation.en: Something suspicious.
Ears are in open position.
This is gonna sound nuts.
But I was going to get popcorn earlier,
when this freaky old-timey car pulled into the lot.
translation.zh: ‎有一个奇怪的老车停在了停车场

translation.en: And the driver was--
You just gotta see it to believe it.
Could you possibly point me in the direction of this strange vehicle?
translation.zh:
‎你可以给我指一下
‎那辆奇怪的车的方位吗？

translation.en: It's that one.
Right there.
Okay.
Let's take a look.
-Oh, and, uh… -Yes?
Hubie, do be… careful.
What the what?
Okay, whoa, there.
Step out of the vehicle!
We can do this the easy way or the paddle way. It's up to you.
translation.zh: ‎不要敬酒不吃吃罚酒 你自己选择

translation.en: Ghost!
Help me!
What are you?
Help me!
No! Oh, God!
Why?
[kids shouting, clamoring] Get him!
What the heck?
[grunts] Help me!
-Now do you want me? -[Mrs. Hennessy] No!
[Hubie] There's a time and a place for hijinks!
translation.zh: ‎现在确实是搞恶作剧的时间和地点

translation.en: But there's a situation going on here!
Hubie. It's funny seeing you here.
translation.zh: ‎修比 在这里看到你真搞笑

translation.en: I'm sorry about before. In the basement.
translation.zh: ‎之前地下室的事情 抱歉了

translation.en: I really wasn't feeling myself.
I don't know if I like you much better now.
translation.zh: ‎我好像现在也没有更喜欢你

translation.en: You didn't tell anybody about that, did you, Hubie?
translation.zh: ‎你没有告诉任何人吧 修比？

translation.en: Why? You have secrets, Mr. Lambert?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？你有秘密 兰伯特先生？

translation.en: As in, secretly dropping by the corn maze earlier tonight?
translation.zh: ‎比如 刚才秘密到了玉米地迷宫？

translation.en: Did anybody get--
-Mr. Lambert. -Walter.
Your tombstone says that you have yet to die.
translation.zh: ‎你的墓碑说 你还没有死

translation.en: Are you a human being, or are you a moon-crazed beast
translation.zh: ‎你是人类 还是墓地里爬出来的

translation.en: from beyond the grave, grave, grave?
Hold that thought! I gotta split!
translation.zh: ‎我一会儿再回答你 我要撕裂了！

translation.en: Mr. Lambert!
That just answered my question.
[male announcer] Oh, man. That's another one.
What a man! What a mouth! And on his first try.
translation.zh:
‎这个人真厉害！这张嘴真厉害！
‎这还是他第一次尝试

translation.en: Have a round of applause, everyone.
Who's next?
If the mayor can do it, so can you.
translation.zh: ‎如果市长能做 你们也能做

translation.en: You, sir! Step on up.
Sorry to bother you, mayor, but it's important.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉打扰你 市长 但是这很重要

translation.en: What is it, Sergeant?
About an hour ago, I got a strange report
translation.zh:
‎约一小时之前
‎我接到了奇怪的报告

translation.en: of a missing high school kid from Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh:
‎修比·杜布瓦报告
‎一个高中生失踪了

translation.en: After I laughed it off as usual, I got a call from the kid's mother.
translation.zh:
‎我像平常那样一笑而过之后
‎我接到了孩子妈妈的电话

translation.en: He actually never made it home.
This Richard Hartman thing has got you jumpy as hell.
translation.zh:
‎这个理查德·哈特曼的事情
‎让你变得这么疑神疑鬼

translation.en: I suggest we cancel the fireworks show immediately.
translation.zh: ‎我建议我们立刻取消烟花表演

translation.en: We ain't canceling a damn thing, Sergeant.
translation.zh: ‎我们什么都不会取消 警佐

translation.en: We got an unsolved mystery!
Eighty-five percent of the tourism dollars spent in this town are spent on Halloween night.
translation.zh:
‎这个城市85%的游客消费
‎都花在万圣节上

translation.en: And I'm not gonna let no high school peckerhead jeopardize that.
translation.zh:
‎我才不会让
‎一个高中的毛头小子毁掉一切

translation.en: -I just think that-- -Trick-or-treat, smell my feet.
translation.zh:
‎-我只是想…
‎-不给糖就捣蛋 请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: -I just think that you're not-- -Smell my feet.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得我们不应该…
‎-请你快点滚蛋

translation.en: -I just think that-- -Smell my feet.
You really want me to smell them?
Let's just go back, Danielle.
translation.zh: ‎我们还是回去吧 黛妮尔

translation.en: I don't want Mom to get home and see that Tommy left us by ourselves.
translation.zh:
‎我不想让妈妈到家之后
‎发现汤米不管我们两个 自己走掉了

translation.en: I think we'll all get in really big trouble for that.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得那样我们都会惹上大麻烦的

translation.en: Are we even going the right way?
Excuse me, sir?
Do you know the quickest way to Wallace Orchard?
translation.zh: ‎你知道去华雷斯果园最快的路吗？

translation.en: -♪ It was Halloween night at the castle… ♪ -Hey, handsome. Soup's ready.
translation.zh:
‎-那是城堡中的万圣夜…
‎-喂 帅哥 汤好了

translation.en: One clam, one chicken noodle, and one split pea.
translation.zh: ‎一份蛤蜊 一份鸡肉面 一份干豌豆瓣

translation.en: So, you seem a little stressed. I mean, what can I do to help ya out?
translation.zh:
‎我感觉你有一点紧张
‎我能帮你什么吗？

translation.en: Maybe a glass of Chardonnay?
Well, to be honest with ya, I don't drink beer.
translation.zh: ‎跟你说实话 我不喝啤酒

translation.en: But do you have any silver bullets?
That is not on the menu tonight.
But I happen to be an excellent listener if you want to, you know,
translation.zh:
‎你知道 如果你想说
‎我刚好是非常善于倾听的人

translation.en: share anything with me.
Okay.
We all have a purpose.
Some people's purpose is to make sure all the streets are clean.
translation.zh: ‎有人的目标是保证所有街道都整洁

translation.en: Some people's purpose,
like Kenny Rogers', is to make sure there's great tunes on the radio
translation.zh:
‎比如坎尼·罗杰斯
‎是要保证广播上有动听的音乐

translation.en: that we can all sing along with on road trips.
translation.zh: ‎我们都可以在长途开车的时候听

translation.en: Some people's purpose, like you,
are here to make sure that kids without parents end up with a mom anyways.
translation.zh:
‎就是在这里确保没有家长的孩子们
‎至少能有一个妈妈

translation.en: Who is nice and kind to 'em and makes them feel loved.
translation.zh:
‎善良、对他们好的妈妈
‎让他们感觉到自己被爱着

translation.en: -You happen to have any A1 Sauce? -Yeah.
My whole life,
I felt my purpose was to make sure everybody
translation.zh: ‎我都感觉自己的目标是让所有人

translation.en: was safe and sound on Halloween.
But tonight, I have failed massively.
Because a fine young man was abducted under my watch.
translation.zh:
‎因为一个好好的年轻人
‎在我眼皮底下被绑架了

translation.en: -That's on me. -No.
How can I help you?
You just did help me by listening to my story.
translation.zh: ‎你听我诉说这些 就已经是帮我了

translation.en: Be careful today.
Danger is afoot.
Oh, well, I don't worry about me. I worry about my kids.
translation.zh: ‎我不担心自己 我担心我的孩子们

translation.en: Called home. None of 'em picked up.
translation.zh: ‎给家里打了电话 没有一个人接

translation.en: They're probably just watching a movie, though, and…
-Tommy's keeping an eye on them. -Tommy?
I'm sure he's been there the whole time. Without a doubt.
translation.zh:
‎他肯定一直都在照顾两个妹妹
‎毫无疑问

translation.en: The night is young. Appreciate you being nice to me.
translation.zh: ‎夜晚才刚刚开始 谢谢你对我友好

translation.en: Of course, Hubie.
You're the best person I know.
You're always thinking of everyone else and never of yourself.
translation.zh: ‎你总是为别人着想 从来不考虑自己

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.
translation.zh: ‎但我猜 所以你才是英雄吧

translation.en: Did you see how scared Scooby was when that car started moving? [laughing]
translation.zh:
‎你看到车开动的时候
‎史酷比有多害怕了吗？

translation.en: -With his ping-pong paddle at the ready! -Oh, my God!
translation.zh:
‎-他那个保温杯都要扔了
‎-天啊！

translation.en: What a buffoon!
[mocking Hubie's voice] Mr. Hennessy! Mr. Hennessy!
There's somebody in the road.
-Who the hell is that? -It's not moving.
Looks like a dummy.
You look like a dummy. Go out and get it out of the way.
translation.zh: ‎你才看起来像假人 出去把它弄走

translation.en: Okay.
Now, see, that does it for me.
translation.zh: ‎你看 这个可以代替我了

translation.en: You like that?
No.
Scarecrow?
Lester!
Lester!
I'm gonna kick your ass for this, Lester.
translation.zh: ‎莱斯特 你再逗我 我会教训你的

translation.en: I swear to God, if you jump out of one of these bushes,
translation.zh:
‎我向上帝发誓
‎如果你从那些灌木丛里跳出来

translation.en: I'm gonna punch you in the face!
What the--
Lester!
Where are you?
[Hubie] Valentine family, where are you?
translation.zh: ‎瓦伦丁一家 你们在哪里？

translation.en: I'm coming!
Danielle! Cooky!
I say, "Marco." You say, "Polo." Marco!
translation.zh: ‎我说“马可” 你们说“波罗” 马可！

translation.en: [man 1] Weirdo!
Marco!
[man 2] Asshole!
Hubie Dubois! Is that you?
[Walter] Oh! You must be Mrs. Dubois!
I'm Walter!
Nice to meet you, Walter.
It's a shame what they've done to your lawn!
translation.zh: ‎他们这样对你的草坪 太可惜了

translation.en: Happens every year!
Not tonight!
We need to talk.
[Tommy] They're not up here.
[Megan] They're not down here, either.
Danielle!
Cooky!
-We didn't find them. -Hey! It's okay. We'll figure it out.
translation.zh:
‎-我们没找到他们
‎-喂！没事的 我们会想出办法的

translation.en: -We'll find them. -[pounding at door]
What are we screaming at?
-Bam. -Mr. Dubois, I screwed up.
translation.zh:
‎-砰
‎-杜布瓦先生 我搞糟了

translation.en: -I can't find my sisters. -You don't know where the kids are? Huh.
translation.zh:
‎-我找不到两个妹妹了
‎-你不知道两个孩子在哪里？

translation.en: 'Cause I do. They're right here.
-[girls] Tommy! Tommy! -Oh, my God!
I'm so sorry I left guys. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.zh:
‎我丢下你们 太抱歉了
‎你没事 太好了

translation.en: You are so cute with them.
translation.zh: ‎你和她们在一起 好可爱

translation.en: You have a girlfriend?
I saw 'em coming through the Old McMillan shortcut.
translation.zh: ‎我看到她们穿过老麦克米兰的近路

translation.en: It was funny, 'cause not many people know where that shortcut is.
translation.zh: ‎有意思 因为知道那条近路的人不多

translation.en: Just me and a friend of mine, Richie Hartman. When I was a kid,
translation.zh:
‎只有我和我的一个朋友知道
‎理查·哈特曼 我们小时候

translation.en: we used to finish our band practice and shoot right through there.
translation.zh:
‎经常乐队练习完之后
‎就直接跑到那里

translation.en: -Well, at least everybody's safe. -No one in Salem is safe tonight.
translation.zh:
‎-至少大家都安全
‎-塞勒姆今晚没人能安全

translation.en: Do you understand me, Tommy? That's why I'm putting this family on lockdown.
translation.zh:
‎明白我的意思吗 汤米？
‎所以我要封锁你们家

translation.en: Now, Tommy, you call your mother. Let her know you're home.
translation.zh:
‎现在 汤米 你给你妈妈打电话
‎让她知道你回家了

translation.en: Megan, you call your parents.
translation.zh: ‎梅根 你给你父母打电话

translation.en: Let them know you're staying at a friend's. That's for you.
translation.zh:
‎让他们知道你留在朋友家
‎算我帮你的

translation.en: You two, do me a favor. Eat all the candy you want, and then go straight to sleep.
translation.zh:
‎你们两个 帮我个忙
‎想吃多少糖都可以 然后直接睡觉

translation.en: And lock this door! No matter what, don't answer it!
translation.zh: ‎锁上门 不论谁敲门 都不要回应！

translation.en: What're you gonna do, Mr. Dubois?
translation.zh: ‎你要做什么 杜布瓦先生？

translation.en: I'm gonna do what I do every October 31st.
translation.zh: ‎我要去做每年10月31日都做的事

translation.en: Make sure every citizen in this town is safe and protected.
translation.zh:
‎保证这个城市的每一个市民
‎都安然无恙 受到保护

translation.en: Um, but do you have a bathroom I could use? 'Cause I, uh…
translation.zh:
‎但你们家
‎有厕所可以给我用一下吗？我…

translation.en: The soup kinda went right through me.
Upstairs.
Toilet? Is it a big toilet?
'Cause I got a lot to do.
I know that howl.
Walter Lambert!
The transformation is complete.
While I understand that you are now a mindless killing machine,
translation.zh:
‎我知道 现在你是一个
‎没有感情的杀人机器

translation.en: I would like to speak with the human being that is deep down below your fur.
translation.zh:
‎但我想和你皮毛之下
‎内心深处的那个人类聊聊

translation.en: Mr. Lambert.
Walter.
I cannot, in good faith, allow you to hurt another soul tonight,
translation.zh:
‎我真的无法容忍你在今晚
‎再伤害一个灵魂

translation.en: even though this is Halloween, and even though I know this is--
translation.zh: ‎虽然这是万圣节 虽然我知道这…

translation.en: Mr. Lambert, you're better than that.
translation.zh: ‎兰伯特先生 你不会这么没有自制力

translation.en: You-- Did you really wanna defecate in front of me, sir?
translation.zh:
‎你…… 你真的想
‎在我面前大便吗 先生？

translation.en: Oh, now, you're eating it!
Is that Michael Mundi you're eating right now?
translation.zh: ‎你现在吃的是迈克尔·蒙迪吗？

translation.en: Is he inside your feces?
-[barking] -Mr. Lambert! Get over here!
[Hubie's voice] The only way to slay the beast is a silver bullet right between the eyes.
translation.zh:
‎唯一能够杀掉野兽的办法
‎就是正中两眼之间 射入一颗银子弹

translation.en: Yo, dawg! That's my bullet!
Mr. Lambert?
Mr. Lambert.
Mr. Lambert?
Mr. Lambert.
Mr. Lambert.
This is not your fault!
You are cursed!
Hello.
Mommy! No! Help me, Mommy!
Help me! Help me!
-[man] And stay out! -[women laughing]
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
That was so terrifying!
-That was even crazier than last year! -Yes!
-How much fun was that? -That was so much fun. [laughing]
It almost made me forget that I buried my father today.
translation.zh: ‎差点让我忘了 我今天埋葬了我父亲

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry.
No, it's a good thing. I mean, not for him so much,
translation.zh:
‎不 这是一件好事
‎对他来说就不是好事了

translation.en: but it's given me time to be introspective.
-That's good. -I'm Pete Landolfa.
Oh, I'm Chantal.
-Chantal? -Yeah.
Come to me.
Walter. Come!
Here, Walter.
I don't wanna do this.
You've been a very good neighbor to me.
But what has to be done, has to be done.
Right between…
the eyes!
Oh, no.
-[dog barks] -No!
Homeboy. Are you okay, man?
-Dude. -No!
This is not real. You get that, right?
We're just trying to raise money for our school.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是在给我们的学校筹款

translation.en: Wait a second.
-Are you hittin' on me? -[laughing]
Because if so, that is incredibly sick.
translation.zh: ‎如果真是那样 那可太恶心了

translation.en: We're having a conversation.
Mm-mmm. 'Cause you're, like, three times my age, okay?
translation.zh: ‎你年龄是我的三倍 好吗？

translation.en: Thrice. I was born around the same time you had your first heart bypass.
translation.zh:
‎三倍 你第一次动心脏手术的时候
‎我才刚出生

translation.en: -[dog barks] -Oh, Buster! Hey, my big boy.
Are you here to protect me from this weirdo man that's trying to hit on me?
translation.zh:
‎你是来保护我的吗？
‎不让我被这个想睡我的怪胎拐走？

translation.en: [screaming] My eyes are on fire!
-Why would you mace me? -Yo.
I'm a dentist. I help people!
translation.zh: ‎我是牙医 我帮助人们啊！

translation.en: Liar! Lucifer!
[laughing] That sounds like Hubie Dubois.
And since I struck out with you, I'm gonna take it out on him.
translation.zh:
‎既然我在你这里碰了一鼻子灰
‎我要去找他讨回来

translation.en: Have fun with that.
You gotta be-- Whoa. [chuckles]
There's this goof headed his way. Hubie Dubois.
translation.zh:
‎有一个蠢货正在往这边走
‎修比·杜布瓦

translation.en: When he gets here, I'll handle the scaring.
You just sit back and enjoy. [snickers]
[Hubie] Attention, haunted house patrons.
translation.zh: ‎注意 闹鬼的房子里的客人们

translation.en: This is a direct order from the AUU.
Move quickly and quietly toward the exits.
The man-wolf has eaten his kryptonite!
Pubie!
Oh, my God. This is a travesty.
First, Mike Mundi. Now, Mr. Landolfa.
translation.zh:
‎先是迈克·蒙迪
‎现在轮到兰道尔法先生

translation.en: And why would God do this to such good people?
translation.zh: ‎上帝为什么要这样对善良的人？

translation.en: Good people? All those two ever did was abuse you, man.
translation.zh:
‎善良的人？
‎那两个人总是欺负你 先生

translation.en: You know who should feel bad right now? Our wonderful mayor.
translation.zh:
‎你知道现在谁应该感到难过吗？
‎我们优秀的市长

translation.en: I'm truly sorry.
You knew that high school kid from the corn maze was missing.
translation.zh:
‎你知道玉米地迷宫里
‎那个高中生丢了

translation.en: -But you told nobody. -Yeah. Bad for business, I guess.
translation.zh:
‎-但你谁都没告诉
‎-对 我觉得不利于商业

translation.en: Oh, they just found Lester Hennessy's car abandoned in the middle of Whipstick Road.
translation.zh:
‎他们刚刚发现了莱斯特·轩尼斯的车
‎停在威普斯提克路中间

translation.en: -No sign of Lester or Mary. -No!
translation.zh:
‎-莱斯特或者玛丽不见了
‎-不是吧！

translation.en: So, we are cancelin' the fireworks
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们要取消烟花会

translation.en: and all other related Halloween activities.
translation.zh: ‎和其他所有万圣节相关活动

translation.en: -Officer Steve. -Not now, Hubie.
translation.zh:
‎-史蒂夫警官
‎-现在不行 修比

translation.en: -I think I know who did it. -Oh, so do I.
translation.zh:
‎-我想我知道是谁干的
‎-我也知道

translation.en: His name…
is Walter Lambert.
-Walter who? -Lambert.
Scientists would call him a lyco-thorpe.
I think he means a lycanthrope.
-Is that what it is? -It's a werewolf.
-Okay. -Hubie, I will lock you up.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧
‎-修比 我要把你关起来

translation.en: -I got four people missing here. -Officer Steve, listen to me.
translation.zh:
‎-已经有四个人失踪了
‎-史蒂夫警官 听我说

translation.en: I saw the man destroy his home earlier today.
translation.zh:
‎我今天白天看到这个人
‎毁坏自己的家

translation.en: Then I saw him in the pumpkin patch.
His shirt was torn up. He was barking at the moon.
translation.zh: ‎他的上衣撕坏了 他对着月亮吼叫

translation.en: His arms were very, very hairy.
Then I saw him at this haunted house, his tail wagging in murderous glee.
translation.zh:
‎然后我在闹鬼的房子看到了他
‎他的尾巴凶残欢快地摇

translation.en: -Wait, you talking about my dog, Buster. -That was Walter Lambert!
translation.zh:
‎-等一下 你说的是我的狗 巴斯特
‎-那是沃特·兰伯特！

translation.en: Where does he live?
Fifty-Nine Elm Street. Check on it.
-There's your killer. -[man on phone] Salem PD.
Blake, I need you to go out to 59 Elm.
translation.zh:
‎-塞勒姆警局
‎-布莱克 我需要你去艾尔姆街59号看

translation.en: There should be a guy there. New in town. Possibly shirtless.
translation.zh:
‎里面应该有个人
‎新来到这个城市 可能没穿上衣

translation.en: Yeah. Middle-aged, growls a lot, glue-on hairy hands?
translation.zh:
‎对 中年人 咆哮不止
‎粘合的毛茸茸的手臂？

translation.en: Yeah, I got him right here. Him and your boy, Richie Hartman.
translation.zh:
‎对 他就在这里
‎他和你那个人理查·哈特曼

translation.en: They both came by and turned themselves in, like, 45 minutes ago.
translation.zh: ‎他们两个人45分钟之前过来自首的

translation.en: Together?
Yeah. Apparently, Lambert is Hartman's roommate at the mental hospital.
translation.zh:
‎对 欣然 兰伯特是哈特曼
‎在精神病院的室友

translation.en: Sorry. Werewolf Treatment Center.
Lambert broke out about a month ago, and then Hartman broke out yesterday
translation.zh:
‎兰伯特大约一个月前逃出精神病院
‎然后哈特曼是昨天逃出来的

translation.en: to try to find him and convince him to come back.
translation.zh: ‎想出来找他 劝说他回去

translation.en: It's actually pretty sweet, isn't it?
So, you've had eyes on them for 45 minutes?
translation.zh: ‎所以你已经看着他们45分钟了

translation.en: [Blake] Almost, like, an hour now.
And also, Lambert's real name is Nick Hudson. Yeah. Walter Lambert
translation.zh:
‎还有 兰伯特的真实姓名
‎是尼克·胡德森 对 沃特·兰伯特…

translation.en: is just some name that he got off a tombstone on his way into town.
translation.zh:
‎只是他进城的时候
‎从墓碑上看到的名字

translation.en: All right, Blake. I got it. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎好了 布莱克 我知道了 谢谢你

translation.en: I feel bad you got yourself in even more trouble just to save me.
translation.zh:
‎你为了救我 让你自己惹上更多麻烦
‎我真的很痛心

translation.en: No, it was good to get out of that place for a while.
translation.zh:
‎没有 从那个地方出来一段时间
‎感觉还挺好的

translation.en: -You did me a favor. Thank you. -Did you do anything fun?
translation.zh:
‎-你帮了我大忙 谢谢
‎-你做了什么有趣的事吗？

translation.en: I pissed on a tombstone, pissed on the street.
translation.zh: ‎我在墓碑上撒尿 在街上撒尿

translation.en: Just some fun pissing stuff, you know.
-Nobody pees more than you. -I'm peein' now.
translation.zh:
‎-没人比你更能尿
‎-我现在就要撒尿

translation.en: -That's a good roommate. Yes. [chuckles] -[sniffing, panting]
-Who's a good roommate? Yes. Yes. -[barking]
[Hartman chuckling] Yes, you are.
Lambert and Hartman have been in custody during the whole Landolfa disappearance.
translation.zh:
‎在兰道尔法失踪的整个过程
‎兰伯特和哈特曼都关在警局

translation.en: So, it couldn't have been them.
-[dog whimpers] -Buster, my baby!
Oh, by the way, he ate a silver bullet if you wanna check his feces tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎对了 它吃了一枚银子弹
‎记得明天看一下它的粪便

translation.en: I ain't doin' that.
Then who? Are there any clues?
Landolfa did go back into the haunted house to look for Hubie.
translation.zh:
‎兰道尔法确实
‎回到闹鬼的房子去找修比了

translation.en: Yeah. Hubie seems to be around a lot of people before they go missing.
translation.zh:
‎对 很多人失踪之前
‎修比似乎都在他们身边啊

translation.en: -People who have messed with him. -Did the Hennesseys mess with Hubie, too?
translation.zh:
‎-耍过他的人
‎-轩尼斯夫妇也耍修比了吗？

translation.en: Oh, they live for it.
So, it was payback time. Wasn't it, Hubie?
translation.zh: ‎那就是报复了 是吧 修比？

translation.en: No, I would never hurt anybody. I--
translation.zh: ‎不是 我从来没有伤害任何人 我…

translation.en: You got the wrong guy.
-Father Dave. -Have you been planning this all along?
translation.zh:
‎-大卫神父
‎-你一直都在计划报仇吗？

translation.en: -[snarling] -You sick man.
-Have you? -I--
Have you?
Frankenstein!
Did we just fall for the old Frankenstein trick?
translation.zh: ‎我们刚刚上科学怪人的当了吗？

translation.en: -[Aurora] Bad news, gang. -[thunderclap]
WTCH has just learned
that Salem's Halloween is getting shut down.
translation.zh: ‎塞勒姆的万圣节活动关闭了

translation.en: [Aurora] The police department is advising everyone to stay home and lock doors.
translation.zh: ‎警方建议所有人留在家里 锁好门

translation.en: But, my little Halloweenies, we can all still celebrate
translation.zh:
‎但是 喜欢万圣节的人们
‎我们还是可以庆祝

translation.en: with nature's fireworks lighting up the night sky.
translation.zh:
‎因为大自然的烟火
‎会点亮今晚的夜空

translation.en: Not sure what's happening in this creepy town,
translation.zh: ‎不知道这个诡异的城市发生了什么

translation.en: but sounds like a good idea to cuddle up with someone special
translation.zh: ‎但似乎和一个特别的人拥抱在一起

translation.en: and enjoy the last half hour of Halloween under the covers.
translation.zh:
‎在被子里享受万圣节的最后半小时
‎是最好的主意

translation.en: And just hope that whoever you cuddling isn't a madman.
translation.zh:
‎不管你拥抱的人是谁
‎希望不是一个疯子

translation.en: Well, looks like I have company.
So, we're going to take a word from our scary sponsors.
translation.zh: ‎我们要听听我们恐怖的赞助商广告

translation.en: -[whistles like theremin] -[man] W… T… C… H. -Aurora? -[gasps]
-[deep voice] Hubie Dubois. -Yes.
I'd recognize that voice anywhere. You look exactly how I pictured you.
translation.zh:
‎不管在哪里 我都能分辨出你的声音
‎你和我想象之中一模一样

translation.en: To be honest with you, you don't look like the way I was picturing you.
translation.zh:
‎跟你说实话 你跟我想象之中
‎一点都不一样

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] I guess my radio voice throws people off sometimes.
translation.zh: ‎看来我广播上的声音很有欺骗性

translation.en: Yeah, that-- I think that's it.
[deep voice] Have a seat, man.
What brings you all the way here this evenin'?
As you know, I'm a longtime listener, and I always respect the advice you give
translation.zh:
‎你也知道 我是你们的长期重视听众
‎我总是尊重你给很多打来电话的

translation.en: to so many callers.
Right now, I'm in dire need of the most perspicacious advice
translation.zh: ‎现在 我需要你给过所有人类的

translation.en: -you have ever given to any other human-- -[knocking]
[Aurora gasps] Oh, my God. Isn't that so sweet? My wife brought snacks.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 太温馨了 我妻子带来了零食

translation.en: [deep voice] Ooh! Hey, baby. How you doin'?
Oh, and who is this?
Baby, this is Hubie Dubois.
Whoa! For real?
Yes. Nice to meet you, ma'am.
I'm looking forward to hearing your real voice.
translation.zh: ‎我很期待听到你的真实声音

translation.en: This is my real voice.
Right. I know it is. I was just saying, you know…
translation.zh: ‎对 我知道 我只是想说 其实…

translation.en: So, I am a big fan of your husband, Aurora.
translation.zh: ‎我是你丈夫欧若拉的超级粉丝

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
I feel like you're the second most frequent caller we get.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉你是我们来电话第二频繁的人

translation.en: -Besides that one lady. -Someone calls more than I do?
translation.zh:
‎-除了那一位女士
‎-有人比我打电话还频繁？

translation.en: [laughs] Actually, I think she might have a little something for you, Hubie.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我想她可能有东西要给你 修比

translation.en: She always dedicates a song to a special someone.
translation.zh: ‎她总是给一位特别的人送一首歌

translation.en: And we all need that special someone.
-Right, baby? -Yes, we do. Oh!
translation.zh:
‎-对吧 宝贝？
‎-是的 没错

translation.en: Dig in.
-A couple days back… -Oh, man.
…she had a couple glasses of Chardonnay. Her guard was down,
translation.zh: ‎她喝了几杯霞多丽 警戒意识降低

translation.en: and she asked to dedicate a special song to Hubie.
-Chardonnay, eh? -You know what they say about Chardonnay?
translation.zh:
‎-霞多丽？
‎-你知道他们怎么说霞多丽吗？

translation.en: Truth serum. She said she's gonna show you how much she loves you on Halloween.
translation.zh:
‎真话血清 她说她会在万圣节
‎展示出她有多爱你

translation.en: -Do you think we could trace the number? -I don't need to. Caller ID.
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得还能找到电话号码吗？
‎-我不需要找 来电人是

translation.en: Sound familiar?
No. But there is a number that needs to be dialed immediately.
translation.zh:
‎不熟 但是有一个号码
‎我需要立刻拨打

translation.en: It's a prepaid phone.
-[high-pitched voice] Bitch used a burner. -Mm-hmm.
Any idea of someone who might have a thing for you, or…
translation.zh: ‎知道谁可能对你有意思吗？或者…

translation.en: How would somebody detect such a situation?
translation.zh: ‎这种情况 应该怎么分辨出来？

translation.en: Anyone in town who seems like they might actually enjoy talking to you.
translation.zh:
‎这个城市中
‎任何似乎真正喜欢跟你聊天的人

translation.en: There's one woman, but she's the nicest lady I ever met my life.
translation.zh:
‎有一个女人 但她是我这辈子见过
‎最好的女人

translation.en: Well, they all seem nice till they kill you.
translation.zh: ‎所有女人杀你之前 都感觉挺好

translation.en: What's the desperate sicko's name?
[whispers] The high school hat trick, Violet Valentine.
translation.zh: ‎高中三连冠 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁

translation.en: Her? And you?
I mean…
All right. Let's go see if we can get ourselves a confession.
translation.zh:
‎好 我们去看看
‎能不能拿到对方的认罪

translation.en: Ooh! This is some Dateline NBC shit.
translation.zh: ‎感觉像《日界线》侦探节目似的

translation.en: [Hubie] Stormhawk in position and petrified. Over.
translation.zh: ‎暴风之鹰到位并固定 完毕

translation.en: All right. First of all, we're not gonna use code names.
translation.zh: ‎好 首先 我们不会使用代号 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay? -[Hubie] Copy.
Did you send backup to my residence to have eyes on my mother? Over.
translation.zh:
‎你派人去居民区
‎盯着点我妈了吗？完毕

translation.en: I'm a little short-handed tonight,
so I asked Father Dave to keep an eye on her.
Negative! Request armed units to that vicinity. Over.
translation.zh: ‎不行！请求武装人员去附近 完毕

translation.en: Sorry. I can't spare the manpower tonight.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 今晚没有多余的警力

translation.en: Here she comes.
