Okay, Hubie. It's showtime. Remember, we're lookin' for a confession.
translation.zh:
‎好 修比 表演时间到
‎记住 我们要的是让她承认

translation.en: But what if I can't get her to confess? Over.
translation.zh: ‎但如果我无法让她承认呢？完毕

translation.en: If you feel like you've done all you can, or you feel like you're in danger,
translation.zh:
‎如果你感觉你已经竭尽所能了
‎或者感觉自己有危险

translation.en: say the code word. At that point, we'll call the burner phone.
translation.zh:
‎说出代码词汇 到时候
‎我们就给一次性手机打电话

translation.en: If she picks up, we can implicate her that way.
translation.zh: ‎如果她接了 我们可以在电话里引导

translation.en: And what's the code word again? Over.
-You don't have to say over. -[Hubie] Okay.
Code word is pumpkin.
Roger that. Bogey on my twelve.
translation.zh: ‎收到 目标在我十二点钟位置

translation.en: Three on a match. Smoke 'em if you got 'em.
translation.zh: ‎三秒钟后启动 收到请吸烟

translation.en: "Smoke 'em if you got--" What the hell is he talking about?
I don't know.
What'd you ask me out here for, Hubie?
translation.zh: ‎你让我来这里干嘛 修比？

translation.en: What's up?
Pumpkin.
-Straight to pumpkin? -Yeah.
Pumpkin what?
Just pumpkin.
Don't kill me.
-You gotta be kiddin' me. -Dialing.
Hubie.
I would never hurt you.
Thank you. Pumpkin.
Now! Pumpkin.
-It's ringing. -Is this a prank?
Is there somebody watching us right now?
-No one can see us or hear us. -She must not have the phone on her.
translation.zh:
‎-没人能看到或者听到我们
‎-她肯定没把手机戴在身上

translation.en: Hello?
I just wanted to tell you that I have been in love with you since second grade.
translation.zh:
‎我只是想告诉你 我从二年级开始
‎就一直爱着你

translation.en: -What? -Hello?
[whispers] Can you trace it now?
Hubie, I've been in love with you since the first grade.
translation.zh: ‎修比 我从一年级开始就爱着你

translation.en: What took you so long?
I was in love with our teacher.
Miss Glennon?
-Wasn't she, like, 70? -I liked the way she smelled.
translation.zh:
‎-她不是70岁了吗？
‎-我喜欢她微笑的样子

translation.en: I can't believe this.
I can't believe that I spent three years with a self-confident-for-no-reason,
translation.zh:
‎我真不敢相信
‎我和那个迷之自信的大胡子恶魔

translation.en: bearded, human-ogre when I could have been with you.
translation.zh: ‎过了三年 而我本可以和你在一起的

translation.en: Ouch. That even hurt me.
I'm getting a location. Steve, look at this.
translation.zh: ‎我拿到地址了 史蒂夫 看这个

translation.en: -[Steve] Stormhawk, abort! -I thought you were out of my league.
translation.zh:
‎-暴风之鹰 放弃任务
‎-我以为我配不上你 ‎-为什么？
‎-暴风之鹰 重复一次 放弃任务

translation.en: -Why? -Stormhawk, repeat, abort!
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-暴风之鹰 重复一次 放弃任务

translation.en: It's the best news I ever heard in my life.
translation.zh: ‎这是我这辈子听过最好的消息

translation.en: Abort. The killer's cell phone is in your house!
translation.zh: ‎放弃 杀手的手机在你家里！

translation.en: Mama!
No! No way!
Lock your doors! Make sure you don't open them!
Take care of your children! I'm gonna steal a boat!
translation.zh:
‎照顾好你的孩子们！
‎我要去偷一艘船！

translation.en: Mama!
I love you!
Oh, no. They got Father Dave.
translation.zh: ‎不是吧 他们把大卫神父抓起来了

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Why aren't you watching my mother?
The killer's in the house! The killer's in the house!
There's no one in the house but her.
Hubie?
Can you help me down?
Ma! Ma!
You're okay.
Why, yes, Hubie. Why wouldn't I be?
translation.zh: ‎对 怎么了 修比 我为什么要有事？

translation.en: Oh, no.
So, um…
Am I your special someone, Mom?
translation.zh: ‎我是你的特别之人 妈妈？

translation.en: Always, Hubie.
And… today, did you--
did you try to show me just how much you love me?
translation.zh: ‎你是想告诉我 你有多爱我吗？

translation.en: Why, yes, I did, Hubie. I truly did.
translation.zh: ‎对 是的 修比 确实是的

translation.en: -[man 1] Hubie! -[woman 1] Hubie!
[man 1] Get us out of here! Help!
[Landolfa] Hubie, please, get us out of here!
translation.zh: ‎修比 拜托 放我们出去！

translation.en: Hubie, there's something wrong with your mom!
Come on over here and let me punch your mom in the face!
I mean, the good news is you're still alive. I was--
translation.zh: ‎好消息是 你们还活着 我…

translation.en: Nice observation, toolbox! Now get us out of this!
translation.zh: ‎观察得不错 废物！放我们走！

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -I tried to explain to you already, Hubie.
translation.zh:
‎-太抱歉了
‎-我已经试着向你解释过了 修比

translation.en: If you don't fight back, the bullies never stop.
translation.zh: ‎如果你不反击 霸凌者永远不会住手

translation.en: So, I had to fight back for you.
[Mike] Please, Hubie! Oh, my God!
Hubie, that's gas!
Mommy, I would've been satisfied if you put itching powder in their sleeping bag.
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 你在他们的睡袋里放瘙痒粉
‎我就已经很满足了

translation.en: This is extreme.
Don't do this to me. Hubie, I'll be your friend forever!
translation.zh:
‎不要这样对我 修比
‎我会永远做你的朋友！

translation.en: [man] The old lady said they'd be in the backyard.
translation.zh: ‎老太太说 他们会在后院

translation.en: [Tracy] Roll it! Roll it!
You don't have to do this. This is too much.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 你真不用这样 有点太过了

translation.en: We are here and we are live at an unfolding scene of Halloween horror.
translation.zh:
‎我们在这里直播
‎揭开万圣节恐怖之谜的现场

translation.en: -[victims shouting, chattering] -[Hubie] Ma. Ma.
-Mom, I really don't want you to do this. -I know, Hubie.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈 我真的不想让你这样
‎-我知道 修比

translation.en: That's what makes you so wonderful. And that's why I have to do it.
translation.zh:
‎所以你才这么好
‎所以我才更要这样做

translation.en: I have to make it good for you before I go.
translation.zh: ‎我必须要在走之前 帮你解决好

translation.en: Before you go?
-To Heaven? -No. Probably going to Hell, Hubie.
translation.zh:
‎-去天堂？
‎-不 可能是去地狱 修比

translation.en: The cops are here! You're goin' to jail, you crazy old bat!
translation.zh:
‎警察来了！你要去的是监狱
‎你这个疯婆子！

translation.en: -Well, then I better do this now. -[Mr. Hennessy] My God. No, lady. Wait.
translation.zh:
‎-那我最好现在赶快动手了
‎-天啊 不要 女士 等一下

translation.en: -[all screaming, shouting] -No! No, no, no, no!
-Please don't. -[Landolfa] Hubie, stop her.
-Hubie! -[Hubie screams]
No!
[echoing] No.
Always thinking of everyone else, never thinking of yourself.
translation.zh: ‎你总是为别人着想 从来不考虑自己

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.
translation.zh: ‎但我猜 所以你才是英雄吧

translation.en: [Landolfa] Hubie!
No!
-Man. -Freeze, Mrs. Dubois!
translation.zh:
‎-天啊
‎-不许动 杜布瓦太太

translation.en: Hold your fire until my command.
Why did we bring them again?
There was nobody left at the station. We had to.
translation.zh: ‎警局没有人了 必须带上

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, Mommy. This is my fault.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 妈妈 这是我的错

translation.en: -[Mom] That's okay, Hubie. -[Landolfa] Hubie!
-Untie us, dummy! -Come on, you stupid dummy!
translation.zh:
‎-修比！
‎-松绑 蠢货！ ‎-快点 你这个蠢货 放我们走
‎-快点松绑！

translation.en: -Untie us, now! -[Mike] Are you paying attention?
translation.zh:
‎-快点 你这个蠢货 放我们走
‎-快点松绑！ ‎-你有在听吗？
‎-好吧 哇

translation.en: [Mom] Okay. Wow.
Shame on you.
Hubie just saved your lives, and you treat him like this.
translation.zh:
‎修比刚刚救了你们的命
‎你们就这样对他

translation.en: Can one of you tell me why?
translation.zh: ‎你们谁可以告诉我为什么吗？

translation.en: [Landolfa] Just look at him!
He's so… Hubie!
Yes, he's Hubie.
He's helpful.
He's courteous, he's cheerful, he's considerate.
What a bad, bad man.
My great-great-great-great-great- grandmother laid down her life,
translation.zh: ‎我的曾曾曾曾曾祖母贡献出了一生

translation.en: trying to save innocent people.
I was there.
And my son did her one better. He just saved four ungrateful jackasses.
translation.zh:
‎我儿子比他更伟大 他刚刚救了
‎四个不知感恩的大混蛋

translation.en: Thanks, Pubie.
Well, you can't even thank him without insulting him.
I'm sorry. I don't know why I said Pubie. It just came out.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我也不知道
‎我为什么说了怂逼 自然说出口的

translation.en: Could it be because you feel threatened?
translation.zh: ‎是因为你们感觉到被威胁了吗？

translation.en: I feel a lot of pressure to be cool all the time.
translation.zh: ‎我耍帅总是感觉有很多压力

translation.en: I'm jealous of Hubie being able to be himself.
I lost my hair 20 years ago,
and every time I walk into a room, I feel silly.
translation.zh: ‎每次我走进房间 都觉得自己很傻

translation.en: Why should someone like Hubie have such a thick, luxuriant head of hair,
translation.zh:
‎修比这个人为什么
‎有那么浓密、茂盛的头发？

translation.en: and I look like a California raisin?
I have never felt sexually fulfilled.
translation.zh: ‎我的性欲从来没有得到过满足

translation.en: -But-- -Oh, shut up, Lester.
You're usually there. You know it's true.
translation.zh: ‎你在场 你知道这是真的

translation.en: I'm guessing…
Hubie hasn't had a lot of sex.
No, ma'am.
Hasn't had any sex.
But what he does have is hope.
translation.zh: ‎但是他所拥有的 是希望

translation.en: Damn him and his hope!
I was diagnosed with dyslexia in the eighth grade.
translation.zh: ‎我在八年级被诊断得了诵读困难

translation.en: I faked it for the doctors, but I'm really just dumb.
translation.zh:
‎我在医生们面前假装
‎但我真的就是很笨

translation.en: I never really told anybody.
You're probably all surprised.
-No, I'm not surprised. -Nope.
-You surprised? -[laughs] No.
But Hubie uses big words, and they come out so natural for him.
translation.zh:
‎但是修比能使用大词汇
‎从他嘴里那么自然地就说出来了

translation.en: It pisses me off.
Oh, 'cause of the dumb thing.
My brother-in-law once said that I had no ambition.
translation.zh: ‎我姐夫有一次说 我没有野心

translation.en: And then he bit me, and I became a werewolf.
translation.zh: ‎然后他咬了我 我就变成了狼人

translation.en: You see?
Hubie's smart, has nice hair, and sex hope.
translation.zh:
‎修比很聪明 有着浓密的头发
‎还有性爱的希望

translation.en: But to me,
his best quality is this.
He can weather all of your insults and your thrown objects,
translation.zh:
‎尽管你们对他的侮辱
‎尽管你们对他扔东西

translation.en: and he responds with humor and-- and kindness.
Could you say the same?
Could any of you take the abuse you dish out to my Hubie?
translation.zh:
‎你们任何人能忍受
‎你们对修比的那些侮辱吗？

translation.en: I busted a guy for DWI last week, and, uh…
translation.zh: ‎我上周抓了一个酒驾的人 然后…

translation.en: he said it was an honor to be arrested by a Muppet.
translation.zh: ‎他说被一个大青蛙抓 是荣幸

translation.en: I acted like I didn't hear him.
But then I cried in my squad car for about half an hour.
translation.zh:
‎然后我在我的巡逻车里
‎哭了大概半小时

translation.en: You see, Hubie. True bravery's being kind.
translation.zh: ‎你看 修比 真正的勇敢是保持善良

translation.en: Even to those who are being cruel to you.
translation.zh: ‎即使是面对那些对你残忍的人

translation.en: I just always wanted to be as nice as you, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想一直像你那样善良 妈妈

translation.en: Oh, you were nicer.
But now I know that you're ready to spread your wings and fly without me.
translation.zh:
‎但是现在 我知道你已经
‎准备好展翅飞翔 独立起飞了

translation.en: You don't have to be scared anymore.
I'm feeling emotional.
-And a little horny. -Ooh!
-Not for you. -Oh.
Just know that I'll always love you.
translation.zh: ‎你要知道 我会永远爱你

translation.en: And happy Halloween.
Frankenstein!
[all] Where?
We fell for that twice in one night.
We gotta try that with the orderlies when we get back.
translation.zh: ‎等我们回去 在护工身上试试

translation.en: -Okay. -It's such a… [laughing]
Hubie!
The blood. It's going to my--
Happy Halloween.
One thing I still don't get.
Why did his mom have to kill Peanut the pig?
translation.zh: ‎他妈妈为什么要杀了花生那只猪？

translation.en: That was me, actually. I had a case of the late-night munchies.
translation.zh: ‎其实 那是我干的 我深夜突然饿了

translation.en: All right, we gotta get these guys back to the mental institution.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我们要把这两个人
‎送回精神病院

translation.en: This has been a magical night in Salem, Massachusetts.
translation.zh:
‎今天真是马萨诸塞州
‎塞勒姆神奇的一夜

translation.en: -Excuse me. May I say something? -[Tracy] Yes. Please, go ahead.
translation.zh:
‎-不好意思我能说句话吗？
‎-是 请说

translation.en: Hubie.
I just wanna say happy Halloween to everybody in Salem.
translation.zh:
‎我只想对塞勒姆的所有人说
‎万圣节快乐

translation.en: Also, happy Valentine's Day.
translation.zh: ‎还有 圣瓦伦丁情人节快乐

translation.en: I'm talking to you, Violet Valentine.
translation.zh: ‎我在对你说话 维奥蕾特·瓦伦丁

translation.en: Also…
I just broke up with my Canadian girlfriend.
translation.zh: ‎我刚刚和我的加拿大女友分手了

translation.en: So, I am available.
-Oh, my God. -Miss Valentine, this is for you.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊
‎-瓦伦丁小姐 这个是给你的

translation.en: Hubie, do be mine.
[Hubie] Yummy.
Can you guys stop kissing and check out our costumes?
translation.zh:
‎能别亲了吗？
‎看看我们的服装呗？

translation.en: Yes, of course. Come on.
-Show us what you've got. -Please. Let's see it. Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
‎-来 看你们准备了什么
‎-让我们看看 ‎天啊

translation.en: Oh, well, look at this. I cannot believe we have this.
translation.zh:
‎看看这个
‎真不敢相信我们打扮成这样

translation.en: Father Dave. My childhood friend, Richie Hartman.
translation.zh:
‎大卫神父 我的儿时朋友
‎理查·哈特曼

translation.en: -Is that Officer Steve? -[Violet] Yeah.
And the one and only Mr. Walter Lambert.
translation.zh: ‎还有唯一的沃特·兰伯特先生

translation.en: [Hubie] How did you do this?
Terrific costumes, guys. Especially yours, Cooky.
translation.zh: ‎服装不错 各位 尤其是你 库奇

translation.en: I like it. What are you? A Muppet, right?
translation.zh: ‎我很喜欢 你扮演谁？大青蛙吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
-Our kids are so creative. -They are amazing. Mmm!
translation.zh:
‎-我们的孩子们好有创意
‎-他们好棒

translation.en: You never kissed me like that, Violet.
translation.zh: ‎维奥蕾特 你从来没有那样吻过我

translation.en: I know.
-Yeah, well… -Dad, don't forget your sash.
Okay, yes. Would you put it on me, please? That's right.
translation.zh: ‎好 对 可以帮我戴上吗？好

translation.en: Thank you, Danielle and everybody.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 黛妮尔和所有人

translation.en: I'll see you at the apple-bobbing contest at ten o'clock tonight.
translation.zh: ‎今晚十点的用嘴捡苹果大赛见

translation.en: Oh, and you two. You guys are gonna be hittin' the parties later,
translation.zh: ‎还有你们俩 你们晚点要去派对

translation.en: -so I made these for you. -[clicks]
That's some matzo ball soup, also with a flare gun.
translation.zh: ‎脆饼面丸糖 还有火焰枪

translation.en: You suck!
Sorry about that!
-Thanks, Dad. -Yeah, of course.
And this is chicken gumbo with a hair dryer.
translation.zh: ‎这是鸡肉秋葵汤 还有吹风机

translation.en: [sighs] Wow, that is badass.
All right, guys. Take care. I'll miss you.
translation.zh: ‎好 各位 保重 好吗？我会想你们的

translation.en: -Mr. Mayor Dubois, let's get you downtown. -[car starts]
translation.zh: ‎杜布瓦市长 我带你去市中心

translation.en: -Bye! -Love you, Daddy!
Bye! We love you. We'll see you later!
[Hubie] Bye, guys! Bye-bye!
Hey, Hubie!
You're the man!
Thanks. I learned it all from my mother, who's right behind you.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 我从妈妈那里学来的
‎她就在你们身后

translation.en: -[all gasp] -Got you, O'Doyle!
-[kids laugh] -Happy Halloween!
Happy Halloween to all! And to all, a good fright!
translation.zh:
‎所有人万圣节快乐
‎祝所有人开心刺激

translation.en: [Aurora in high-pitched voice] And so, another Halloween has come to Salem.
translation.zh:
‎就这样 又一年的万圣节
‎来到了塞勒姆

translation.en: So, you best take the advice of our beloved Mayor
translation.zh: ‎你们最好要听亲爱的市长的话

translation.en: and frequent caller, Hubie Dubois. And have a safe and fun time.
translation.zh:
‎一个经常给我们节目来电的人
‎修比·杜布瓦 祝大家平安、开心

translation.en: [Aurora's wife in deep voice] Hang on, baby. Got some spaghetti and meatballs for ya.
translation.zh:
‎等一下 宝贝
‎有点意大利面和肉丸给你

translation.en: [Aurora in deep voice] Okay. Let's Lady and the Tramp that shit.
Murder!
[screaming] What are we screaming at?
Last one. Sorry.
What are you?
[screaming] Who are you?
-What are you? [screaming] -[clattering]
-Boo! -[screams]
When I was a kid, I used to build a tower with all my candy.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候 会用我所有的糖堆一个塔

translation.en: And all the candy I used before the collapsing of--
translation.zh: ‎在塔倒塌前 我用的所有糖…

translation.en: Help me!
Now you're all in big, big trouble.
[grunts] Oh, sorry!
That's you in a nutshell, Hubie.
Here's some Happy Halloween word searches I printed out.
translation.zh: ‎我印了一些万圣节快乐的搜索词汇

translation.en: That-- that was-- that was-- Ah-- [bleep]
No!
[Rob] That's a good roommate.
[June] Hubie Dubois!
-This is Hubie Dubois. -Hubie, I'm standing right behind you.
translation.zh:
‎-我是修比·杜布瓦
‎-‎修比 我就站在你身后

translation.en: Yes!
Freeze, Mrs. Dubois!
Hold your fire until my command.
-Shut up! -Shut it!
[Maya] What the hell are you doing?
Did that turn you on?
What is it supposed to be? Little penises?
Smell my feet.
Smell--
Smell--
-Smell my feet. -Really?
Smell my feet.
Yeah. No, it was fun throwing hot dogs at him.
translation.zh: ‎对 没事 朝他扔热狗很好玩

translation.en: Pubie!
-We gonna eat Peanut tonight. -[horse neighs]
-He was my-- -You be quiet, too. You next.
translation.zh:
‎-他是我…
‎-你也闭嘴 下一个就是你

translation.en: -Oh, dope. -[all laughing]
[man] And… action!
No! No! No! No!
[Julie] Hubie!
[Adam] Not cool! Not cool! Not cool!
